2617AUTHORS OR COPYRIGHT HOLDERS BE LIABLE FOR ANY CLAIM, DAMAGES OR OTHER
2618LIABILITY, WHETHER IN AN ACTION OF CONTRACT, TORT OR OTHERWISE, ARISING FROM,
2619OUT OF OR IN CONNECTION WITH THE SOFTWARE OR THE USE OR OTHER DEALINGS IN THE
2620SOFTWARE.
2621*/
2622
2623#include <stdlib.h>
2624#include <stdarg.h>
2625#include <stdio.h>
2626#include "fort.h"
2627#include <assert.h>
2628#include <string.h>
2629#include <wchar.h>
2630
2631/* #include "vector.h" */ /* Commented by amalgamation script */
2632/* #include "fort_utils.h" */ /* Commented by amalgamation script */
2633/* #include "string_buffer.h" */ /* Commented by amalgamation script */
2634/* #include "table.h" */ /* Commented by amalgamation script */
2635/* #include "row.h" */ /* Commented by amalgamation script */
2636/* #include "properties.h" */ /* Commented by amalgamation script */
2637
2638
2639ft_table_t *ft_create_table(void)
2640{
2641 ft_table_t *result = (ft_table_t *)F_CALLOC(1, sizeof(ft_table_t));
2642 if (result == NULL)
2643 return NULL;
2644
2645 result->rows = create_vector(sizeof(f_row_t *), DEFAULT_VECTOR_CAPACITY);
2646 if (result->rows == NULL) {
2647 F_FREE(result);
2648 return NULL;
2649 }
2650 result->separators = create_vector(sizeof(f_separator_t *), DEFAULT_VECTOR_CAPACITY);
2651 if (result->separators == NULL) {
2652 destroy_vector(result->rows);
2653 F_FREE(result);
2654 return NULL;
2655 }
2656
2657 result->properties = create_table_properties();
2658 if (result->properties == NULL) {
2659 destroy_vector(result->separators);
2660 destroy_vector(result->rows);
2661 F_FREE(result);
2662 return NULL;
2663 }
2664 result->conv_buffer = NULL;
2665 result->cur_row = 0;
2666 result->cur_col = 0;
2667 return result;
2668}
2669
2670
2671void ft_destroy_table(ft_table_t *table)
2672{
2673 size_t i = 0;
2674
2675 if (table == NULL)
2676 return;
2677
2678 if (table->rows) {
2679 size_t row_n = vector_size(table->rows);
2680 for (i = 0; i < row_n; ++i) {
2681 destroy_row(VECTOR_AT(table->rows, i, f_row_t *));
2682 }
2683 destroy_vector(table->rows);
2684 }
2685 if (table->separators) {
2686 size_t row_n = vector_size(table->separators);
2687 for (i = 0; i < row_n; ++i) {
2688 destroy_separator(VECTOR_AT(table->separators, i, f_separator_t *));
2689 }
2690 destroy_vector(table->separators);
2691 }
2692 destroy_table_properties(table->properties);
2693 destroy_string_buffer(table->conv_buffer);
2694 F_FREE(table);
2695}
2696
2697ft_table_t *ft_copy_table(ft_table_t *table)
2698{
2699 if (table == NULL)
2700 return NULL;
2701
2702 ft_table_t *result = ft_create_table();
2703 if (result == NULL)
2704 return NULL;
2705
2706 size_t i = 0;
2707 size_t rows_n = vector_size(table->rows);
2708 for (i = 0; i < rows_n; ++i) {
2709 f_row_t *row = VECTOR_AT(table->rows, i, f_row_t *);
2710 f_row_t *new_row = copy_row(row);
2711 if (new_row == NULL) {
2712 ft_destroy_table(result);
2713 return NULL;
2714 }
2715 vector_push(result->rows, &new_row);
2716 }
2717
2718 size_t sep_sz = vector_size(table->separators);
2719 for (i = 0; i < sep_sz; ++i) {
2720 f_separator_t *sep = VECTOR_AT(table->separators, i, f_separator_t *);
2721 f_separator_t *new_sep = copy_separator(sep);
2722 if (new_sep == NULL) {
2723 ft_destroy_table(result);
2724 return NULL;
2725 }
2726 vector_push(result->separators, &new_sep);
2727 }
2728
2729 /* note: by default new table has allocated default properties, so we
2730 * have to destroy them first.
2731 */
2732 if (result->properties) {
2733 destroy_table_properties(result->properties);
2734 }
2735 result->properties = copy_table_properties(table->properties);
2736 if (result->properties == NULL) {
2737 ft_destroy_table(result);
2738 return NULL;
2739 }
2740
2741 /* todo: copy conv_buffer ?? */
2742
2743 result->cur_row = table->cur_row;
2744 result->cur_col = table->cur_col;
2745 return result;
2746}
2747
2748static int split_cur_row(ft_table_t *table, f_row_t **tail_of_cur_row)
2749{
2750 if (table->cur_row >= vector_size(table->rows)) {
2751 tail_of_cur_row = NULL;
2752 return 0;
2753 }
2754
2755 f_row_t *row = VECTOR_AT(table->rows, table->cur_row, f_row_t *);
2756 if (table->cur_col >= columns_in_row(row)) {
2757 tail_of_cur_row = NULL;
2758 return 0;
2759 }
2760
2761 f_row_t *tail = split_row(row, table->cur_col);
2762 if (!tail) {
2763 tail_of_cur_row = NULL;
2764 return FT_GEN_ERROR;
2765 }
2766
2767 *tail_of_cur_row = tail;
2768 return 0;
2769}
2770
2771int ft_ln(ft_table_t *table)
2772{
2773 assert(table);
2774 fort_entire_table_properties_t *table_props = &table->properties->entire_table_properties;
2775 switch (table_props->add_strategy) {
2776 case FT_STRATEGY_INSERT: {
2777 f_row_t *new_row = NULL;
2778 if (FT_IS_ERROR(split_cur_row(table, &new_row))) {
2779 return FT_GEN_ERROR;
2780 }
2781 if (new_row) {
2782 if (FT_IS_ERROR(vector_insert(table->rows, &new_row, table->cur_row + 1))) {
2783 destroy_row(new_row);
2784 return FT_GEN_ERROR;
2785 }
2786 }
2787 break;
2788 }
2789 case FT_STRATEGY_REPLACE:
2790 // do nothing
2791 break;
2792 default:
2793 assert(0 && "Unexpected situation inside libfort");
2794 break;
2795 }
2796 table->cur_col = 0;
2797 table->cur_row++;
2798 return FT_SUCCESS;
2799}
2800
2801size_t ft_cur_row(const ft_table_t *table)
2802{
2803 assert(table);
2804 return table->cur_row;
2805}
2806
2807size_t ft_cur_col(const ft_table_t *table)
2808{
2809 assert(table);
2810 return table->cur_col;
2811}
2812
2813void ft_set_cur_cell(ft_table_t *table, size_t row, size_t col)
2814{
2815 assert(table);
2816 table->cur_row = row;
2817 table->cur_col = col;
2818}
2819
2820int ft_is_empty(const ft_table_t *table)
2821{
2822 assert(table);
2823 return ft_row_count(table) == 0;
2824}
2825
2826size_t ft_row_count(const ft_table_t *table)
2827{
2828 assert(table && table->rows);
2829 return vector_size(table->rows);
2830}
2831
2832int ft_erase_range(ft_table_t *table,
2833 size_t top_left_row, size_t top_left_col,
2834 size_t bottom_right_row, size_t bottom_right_col)
2835{
2836 assert(table && table->rows);
2837 int status = FT_SUCCESS;
2838
2839 size_t rows_n = vector_size(table->rows);
2840
2841 if (top_left_row == FT_CUR_ROW)
2842 top_left_row = table->cur_row;
2843 if (bottom_right_row == FT_CUR_ROW)
2844 bottom_right_row = table->cur_row;
2845
2846 if (top_left_col == FT_CUR_COLUMN)
2847 top_left_col = table->cur_row;
2848 if (bottom_right_col == FT_CUR_COLUMN)
2849 bottom_right_col = table->cur_row;
2850
2851 if (top_left_row > bottom_right_row || top_left_col > bottom_right_col)
2852 return FT_EINVAL;
2853
2854 f_row_t *row = NULL;
2855 size_t i = top_left_row;
2856 while (i < rows_n && i <= bottom_right_row) {
2857 row = VECTOR_AT(table->rows, i, f_row_t *);
2858 status = ft_row_erase_range(row, top_left_col, bottom_right_col);
2859 if (FT_IS_ERROR(status))
2860 return status;
2861 ++i;
2862 }
2863
2864 f_separator_t *separator = NULL;
2865
2866 size_t n_iterations = MIN(rows_n - 1, bottom_right_row) - top_left_row + 1;
2867 size_t j = 0;
2868 i = top_left_row;
2869 for (j = 0; j < n_iterations; ++j) {
2870 row = VECTOR_AT(table->rows, i, f_row_t *);
2871 if (columns_in_row(row)) {
2872 ++i;
2873 } else {
2874 destroy_row(row);
2875 status = vector_erase(table->rows, i);
2876 if (FT_IS_ERROR(status))
2877 return status;
2878 if (i < vector_size(table->separators)) {
2879 separator = VECTOR_AT(table->separators, i, f_separator_t *);
2880 destroy_separator(separator);
2881 vector_erase(table->separators, i);
2882 }
2883 }
2884 }
2885
2886 return FT_SUCCESS;
2887}
2888
2889
2890static int ft_row_printf_impl_(ft_table_t *table, size_t row, const struct f_string_view *fmt, va_list *va)
2891{
2892 size_t i = 0;
2893 size_t new_cols = 0;
2894
2895 if (table == NULL)
2896 return -1;
2897
2898 f_row_t *new_row = create_row_from_fmt_string(fmt, va);
2899
2900 if (new_row == NULL) {
2901 return -1;
2902 }
2903
2904 f_row_t **cur_row_p = NULL;
2905 size_t sz = vector_size(table->rows);
2906 if (row >= sz) {
2907 size_t push_n = row - sz + 1;
2908 for (i = 0; i < push_n; ++i) {
2909 f_row_t *padding_row = create_row();
2910 if (padding_row == NULL)
2911 goto clear;
2912
2913 if (FT_IS_ERROR(vector_push(table->rows, &padding_row))) {
2914 destroy_row(padding_row);
2915 goto clear;
2916 }
2917 }
2918 }
2919 /* todo: clearing pushed items in case of error ?? */
2920
2921 new_cols = columns_in_row(new_row);
2922 cur_row_p = &VECTOR_AT(table->rows, row, f_row_t *);
2923
2924 switch (table->properties->entire_table_properties.add_strategy) {
2925 case FT_STRATEGY_INSERT: {
2926 if (FT_IS_ERROR(insert_row(*cur_row_p, new_row, table->cur_col)))
2927 goto clear;
2928 break;
2929 }
2930 case FT_STRATEGY_REPLACE: {
2931 if (FT_IS_ERROR(swap_row(*cur_row_p, new_row, table->cur_col)))
2932 goto clear;
2933 break;
2934 }
2935 default:
2936 assert(0 && "Unexpected situation inside libfort");
2937 break;
2938 }
2939
2940 table->cur_col += new_cols;
2941 destroy_row(new_row);
2942 return (int)new_cols;
2943
2944clear:
2945 destroy_row(new_row);
2946 return -1;
2947}
2948
2949#if defined(FT_CLANG_COMPILER) || defined(FT_GCC_COMPILER)
2950#define FT_PRINTF ft_printf
2951#define FT_PRINTF_LN ft_printf_ln
2952#else
2953#define FT_PRINTF ft_printf_impl
2954#define FT_PRINTF_LN ft_printf_ln_impl
2955#endif
2956
2957
2958
2959int FT_PRINTF(ft_table_t *table, const char *fmt, ...)
2960{
2961 assert(table);
2962 va_list va;
2963 va_start(va, fmt);
2964
2965 struct f_string_view fmt_str;
2966 fmt_str.type = CHAR_BUF;
2967 fmt_str.u.cstr = fmt;
2968 int result = ft_row_printf_impl_(table, table->cur_row, &fmt_str, &va);
2969 va_end(va);
2970 return result;
2971}
2972
2973int FT_PRINTF_LN(ft_table_t *table, const char *fmt, ...)
2974{
2975 assert(table);
2976 va_list va;
2977 va_start(va, fmt);
2978
2979 struct f_string_view fmt_str;
2980 fmt_str.type = CHAR_BUF;
2981 fmt_str.u.cstr = fmt;
2982 int result = ft_row_printf_impl_(table, table->cur_row, &fmt_str, &va);
2983 if (result >= 0) {
2984 ft_ln(table);
2985 }
2986 va_end(va);
2987 return result;
2988}
2989
2990#undef FT_PRINTF
2991#undef FT_PRINTF_LN
2992
2993#ifdef FT_HAVE_WCHAR
2994int ft_wprintf(ft_table_t *table, const wchar_t *fmt, ...)
2995{
2996 assert(table);
2997 va_list va;
2998 va_start(va, fmt);
2999
3000 struct f_string_view fmt_str;
3001 fmt_str.type = W_CHAR_BUF;
3002 fmt_str.u.wstr = fmt;
3003 int result = ft_row_printf_impl_(table, table->cur_row, &fmt_str, &va);
3004 va_end(va);
3005 return result;
3006}
3007
3008int ft_wprintf_ln(ft_table_t *table, const wchar_t *fmt, ...)
3009{
3010 assert(table);
3011 va_list va;
3012 va_start(va, fmt);
3013
3014 struct f_string_view fmt_str;
3015 fmt_str.type = W_CHAR_BUF;
3016 fmt_str.u.wstr = fmt;
3017 int result = ft_row_printf_impl_(table, table->cur_row, &fmt_str, &va);
3018 if (result >= 0) {
3019 ft_ln(table);
3020 }
3021 va_end(va);
3022 return result;
3023}
3024
3025#endif
3026
3027void ft_set_default_printf_field_separator(char separator)
3028{
3029 g_col_separator = separator;
3030}
3031
3032static int ft_write_impl_(ft_table_t *table, const f_string_view_t *cell_content)
3033{
3034 assert(table);
3035 f_string_buffer_t *buf = get_cur_str_buffer_and_create_if_not_exists(table);
3036 if (buf == NULL)
3037 return FT_GEN_ERROR;
3038
3039 int status = FT_SUCCESS;
3040 switch (cell_content->type) {
3041 case CHAR_BUF:
3042 status = fill_buffer_from_string(buf, cell_content->u.cstr);
3043 break;
3044#ifdef FT_HAVE_WCHAR
3045 case W_CHAR_BUF:
3046 status = fill_buffer_from_wstring(buf, cell_content->u.wstr);
3047 break;
3048#endif
3049#ifdef FT_HAVE_UTF8
3050 case UTF8_BUF:
3051 status = fill_buffer_from_u8string(buf, cell_content->u.u8str);
3052 break;
3053#endif
3054 default:
3055 status = FT_GEN_ERROR;
3056 }
3057 if (FT_IS_SUCCESS(status)) {
3058 table->cur_col++;
3059 }
3060 return status;
3061}
3062
3063static int ft_write_impl(ft_table_t *table, const char *cell_content)
3064{
3065 f_string_view_t content;
3066 content.type = CHAR_BUF;
3067 content.u.cstr = cell_content;
3068 return ft_write_impl_(table, &content);
3069}
3070
3071#ifdef FT_HAVE_UTF8
3072static int ft_u8write_impl(ft_table_t *table, const void *cell_content)
3073{
3074 f_string_view_t content;
3075 content.type = UTF8_BUF;
3076 content.u.u8str = cell_content;
3077 return ft_write_impl_(table, &content);
3078}
3079#endif /* FT_HAVE_UTF8 */
3080
3081#ifdef FT_HAVE_WCHAR
3082static int ft_wwrite_impl(ft_table_t *table, const wchar_t *cell_content)
3083{
3084 f_string_view_t content;
3085 content.type = W_CHAR_BUF;
3086 content.u.wstr = cell_content;
3087 return ft_write_impl_(table, &content);
3088}
3089#endif
3090
3091
3092int ft_nwrite(ft_table_t *table, size_t count, const char *cell_content, ...)
3093{
3094 size_t i = 0;
3095 assert(table);
3096 int status = ft_write_impl(table, cell_content);
3097 if (FT_IS_ERROR(status))
3098 return status;
3099
3100 va_list va;
3101 va_start(va, cell_content);
3102 --count;
3103 for (i = 0; i < count; ++i) {
3104 const char *cell = va_arg(va, const char *);
3105 status = ft_write_impl(table, cell);
3106 if (FT_IS_ERROR(status)) {
3107 va_end(va);
3108 return status;
3109 }
3110 }
3111 va_end(va);
3112 return status;
3113}
3114
3115int ft_nwrite_ln(ft_table_t *table, size_t count, const char *cell_content, ...)
3116{
3117 size_t i = 0;
3118 assert(table);
3119 int status = ft_write_impl(table, cell_content);
3120 if (FT_IS_ERROR(status))
3121 return status;
3122
3123 va_list va;
3124 va_start(va, cell_content);
3125 --count;
3126 for (i = 0; i < count; ++i) {
3127 const char *cell = va_arg(va, const char *);
3128 status = ft_write_impl(table, cell);
3129 if (FT_IS_ERROR(status)) {
3130 va_end(va);
3131 return status;
3132 }
3133 }
3134 va_end(va);
3135
3136 ft_ln(table);
3137 return status;
3138}
3139
3140
3141
3142
3143#ifdef FT_HAVE_WCHAR
3144
3145int ft_nwwrite(ft_table_t *table, size_t n, const wchar_t *cell_content, ...)
3146{
3147 size_t i = 0;
3148 assert(table);
3149 int status = ft_wwrite_impl(table, cell_content);
3150 if (FT_IS_ERROR(status))
3151 return status;
3152
3153 va_list va;
3154 va_start(va, cell_content);
3155 --n;
3156 for (i = 0; i < n; ++i) {
3157 const wchar_t *cell = va_arg(va, const wchar_t *);
3158 status = ft_wwrite_impl(table, cell);
3159 if (FT_IS_ERROR(status)) {
3160 va_end(va);
3161 return status;
3162 }
3163 }
3164 va_end(va);
3165 return status;
3166}
3167
3168int ft_nwwrite_ln(ft_table_t *table, size_t n, const wchar_t *cell_content, ...)
3169{
3170 size_t i = 0;
3171 assert(table);
3172 int status = ft_wwrite_impl(table, cell_content);
3173 if (FT_IS_ERROR(status))
3174 return status;
3175
3176 va_list va;
3177 va_start(va, cell_content);
3178 --n;
3179 for (i = 0; i < n; ++i) {
3180 const wchar_t *cell = va_arg(va, const wchar_t *);
3181 status = ft_wwrite_impl(table, cell);
3182 if (FT_IS_ERROR(status)) {
3183 va_end(va);
3184 return status;
3185 }
3186 }
3187 va_end(va);
3188
3189 ft_ln(table);
3190 return status;
3191}
3192#endif
3193
3194
3195int ft_row_write(ft_table_t *table, size_t cols, const char *cells[])
3196{
3197 size_t i = 0;
3198 assert(table);
3199 for (i = 0; i < cols; ++i) {
3200 int status = ft_write_impl(table, cells[i]);
3201 if (FT_IS_ERROR(status)) {
3202 /* todo: maybe current pos in case of error should be equal to the one before function call? */
3203 return status;
3204 }
3205 }
3206 return FT_SUCCESS;
3207}
3208
3209int ft_row_write_ln(ft_table_t *table, size_t cols, const char *cells[])
3210{
3211 assert(table);
3212 int status = ft_row_write(table, cols, cells);
3213 if (FT_IS_SUCCESS(status)) {
3214 ft_ln(table);
3215 }
3216 return status;
3217}
3218
3219#ifdef FT_HAVE_WCHAR
3220int ft_row_wwrite(ft_table_t *table, size_t cols, const wchar_t *cells[])
3221{
3222 size_t i = 0;
3223 assert(table);
3224 for (i = 0; i < cols; ++i) {
3225 int status = ft_wwrite_impl(table, cells[i]);
3226 if (FT_IS_ERROR(status)) {
3227 /* todo: maybe current pos in case of error should be equal
3228 * to the one before function call?
3229 */
3230 return status;
3231 }
3232 }
3233 return FT_SUCCESS;
3234}
3235
3236int ft_row_wwrite_ln(ft_table_t *table, size_t cols, const wchar_t *cells[])
3237{
3238 assert(table);
3239 int status = ft_row_wwrite(table, cols, cells);
3240 if (FT_IS_SUCCESS(status)) {
3241 ft_ln(table);
3242 }
3243 return status;
3244}
3245#endif
3246
3247
3248
3249int ft_table_write(ft_table_t *table, size_t rows, size_t cols, const char *table_cells[])
3250{
3251 size_t i = 0;
3252 assert(table);
3253 for (i = 0; i < rows; ++i) {
3254 int status = ft_row_write(table, cols, (const char **)&table_cells[i * cols]);
3255 if (FT_IS_ERROR(status)) {
3256 /* todo: maybe current pos in case of error should be equal
3257 * to the one before function call?
3258 */
3259 return status;
3260 }
3261 if (i != rows - 1)
3262 ft_ln(table);
3263 }
3264 return FT_SUCCESS;
3265}
3266
3267int ft_table_write_ln(ft_table_t *table, size_t rows, size_t cols, const char *table_cells[])
3268{
3269 assert(table);
3270 int status = ft_table_write(table, rows, cols, table_cells);
3271 if (FT_IS_SUCCESS(status)) {
3272 ft_ln(table);
3273 }
3274 return status;
3275}
3276
3277
3278#ifdef FT_HAVE_WCHAR
3279int ft_table_wwrite(ft_table_t *table, size_t rows, size_t cols, const wchar_t *table_cells[])
3280{
3281 size_t i = 0;
3282 assert(table);
3283 for (i = 0; i < rows; ++i) {
3284 int status = ft_row_wwrite(table, cols, (const wchar_t **)&table_cells[i * cols]);
3285 if (FT_IS_ERROR(status)) {
3286 /* todo: maybe current pos in case of error should be equal
3287 * to the one before function call?
3288 */
3289 return status;
3290 }
3291 if (i != rows - 1)
3292 ft_ln(table);
3293 }
3294 return FT_SUCCESS;
3295}
3296
3297int ft_table_wwrite_ln(ft_table_t *table, size_t rows, size_t cols, const wchar_t *table_cells[])
3298{
3299 assert(table);
3300 int status = ft_table_wwrite(table, rows, cols, table_cells);
3301 if (FT_IS_SUCCESS(status)) {
3302 ft_ln(table);
3303 }
3304 return status;
3305}
3306#endif
3307
3308static
3309const char *empty_str_arr[] = {"", (const char *)L"", ""};
3310
3311static
3312const void *ft_to_string_impl(const ft_table_t *table, enum f_string_type b_type)
3313{
3314 assert(table);
3315
3316 const char *result = NULL;
3317
3318 /* Determine size of table string representation */
3319 size_t cod_height = 0;
3320 size_t cod_width = 0;
3321 int status = table_internal_codepoints_geometry(table, &cod_height, &cod_width);
3322 if (FT_IS_ERROR(status)) {
3323 return NULL;
3324 }
3325 size_t n_codepoints = cod_height * cod_width + 1;
3326
3327 /* Allocate string buffer for string representation */
3328 if (table->conv_buffer == NULL) {
3329 ((ft_table_t *)table)->conv_buffer = create_string_buffer(n_codepoints, b_type);
3330 if (table->conv_buffer == NULL)
3331 return NULL;
3332 }
3333 while (string_buffer_cod_width_capacity(table->conv_buffer) < n_codepoints) {
3334 if (FT_IS_ERROR(realloc_string_buffer_without_copy(table->conv_buffer))) {
3335 return NULL;
3336 }
3337 }
3338 if (!buffer_check_align(table->conv_buffer))
3339 return NULL;
3340 char *buffer = (char *)buffer_get_data(table->conv_buffer);
3341
3342 size_t cols = 0;
3343 size_t rows = 0;
3344 size_t *col_vis_width_arr = NULL;
3345 size_t *row_vis_height_arr = NULL;
3346 status = table_rows_and_cols_geometry(table, &col_vis_width_arr, &cols, &row_vis_height_arr, &rows, VISIBLE_GEOMETRY);
3347 if (FT_IS_ERROR(status))
3348 return NULL;
3349
3350 if (rows == 0) {
3351 F_FREE(col_vis_width_arr);
3352 F_FREE(row_vis_height_arr);
3353 return empty_str_arr[b_type];
3354 }
3355
3356 int tmp = 0;
3357 size_t i = 0;
3358 f_context_t context;
3359 context.table_properties = (table->properties ? table->properties : &g_table_properties);
3360 f_row_t *prev_row = NULL;
3361 f_row_t *cur_row = NULL;
3362 f_separator_t *cur_sep = NULL;
3363 size_t sep_size = vector_size(table->separators);
3364
3365 f_conv_context_t cntx;
3366 cntx.u.buf = buffer;
3367 cntx.raw_avail = string_buffer_raw_capacity(table->conv_buffer);
3368 cntx.cntx = &context;
3369 cntx.b_type = b_type;
3370
3371 /* Print top margin */
3372 for (i = 0; i < context.table_properties->entire_table_properties.top_margin; ++i) {
3373 FT_CHECK(print_n_strings(&cntx, cod_width - 1/* minus new_line*/, FT_SPACE));
3374 FT_CHECK(print_n_strings(&cntx, 1, FT_NEWLINE));
3375 }
3376
3377 for (i = 0; i < rows; ++i) {
3378 cur_sep = (i < sep_size) ? VECTOR_AT(table->separators, i, f_separator_t *) : NULL;
3379 cur_row = VECTOR_AT(table->rows, i, f_row_t *);
3380 enum f_hor_separator_pos separatorPos = (i == 0) ? TOP_SEPARATOR : INSIDE_SEPARATOR;
3381 context.row = i;
3382 FT_CHECK(print_row_separator(&cntx, col_vis_width_arr, cols, prev_row, cur_row, separatorPos, cur_sep));
3383 FT_CHECK(snprintf_row(cur_row, &cntx, col_vis_width_arr, cols, row_vis_height_arr[i]));
3384 prev_row = cur_row;
3385 }
3386 cur_row = NULL;
3387 cur_sep = (i < sep_size) ? VECTOR_AT(table->separators, i, f_separator_t *) : NULL;
3388 context.row = i;
3389 FT_CHECK(print_row_separator(&cntx, col_vis_width_arr, cols, prev_row, cur_row, BOTTOM_SEPARATOR, cur_sep));
3390
3391 /* Print bottom margin */
3392 for (i = 0; i < context.table_properties->entire_table_properties.bottom_margin; ++i) {
3393 FT_CHECK(print_n_strings(&cntx, cod_width - 1/* minus new_line*/, FT_SPACE));
3394 FT_CHECK(print_n_strings(&cntx, 1, FT_NEWLINE));
3395 }
3396
3397 result = buffer;
3398
3399clear:
3400 F_FREE(col_vis_width_arr);
3401 F_FREE(row_vis_height_arr);
3402 return result;
3403}
3404
3405const char *ft_to_string(const ft_table_t *table)
3406{
3407 return (const char *)ft_to_string_impl(table, CHAR_BUF);
3408}
3409
3410#ifdef FT_HAVE_WCHAR
3411const wchar_t *ft_to_wstring(const ft_table_t *table)
3412{
3413 return (const wchar_t *)ft_to_string_impl(table, W_CHAR_BUF);
3414}
3415#endif
3416
3417
3418int ft_add_separator(ft_table_t *table)
3419{
3420 assert(table);
3421 assert(table->separators);
3422
3423 while (vector_size(table->separators) <= table->cur_row) {
3424 f_separator_t *sep_p = create_separator(F_FALSE);
3425 if (sep_p == NULL)
3426 return FT_MEMORY_ERROR;
3427 int status = vector_push(table->separators, &sep_p);
3428 if (FT_IS_ERROR(status))
3429 return status;
3430 }
3431
3432 f_separator_t **sep_p = &VECTOR_AT(table->separators, table->cur_row, f_separator_t *);
3433 if (*sep_p == NULL)
3434 *sep_p = create_separator(F_TRUE);
3435 else
3436 (*sep_p)->enabled = F_TRUE;
3437
3438 if (*sep_p == NULL)
3439 return FT_GEN_ERROR;
3440 return FT_SUCCESS;
3441}
3442
3443static const struct fort_border_style *built_in_styles[] = {
3444 &FORT_BASIC_STYLE,
3445 &FORT_BASIC2_STYLE,
3446 &FORT_SIMPLE_STYLE,
3447 &FORT_PLAIN_STYLE,
3448 &FORT_DOT_STYLE,
3449 &FORT_EMPTY_STYLE,
3450 &FORT_EMPTY2_STYLE,
3451 &FORT_SOLID_STYLE,
3452 &FORT_SOLID_ROUND_STYLE,
3453 &FORT_NICE_STYLE,
3454 &FORT_DOUBLE_STYLE,
3455 &FORT_DOUBLE2_STYLE,
3456 &FORT_BOLD_STYLE,
3457 &FORT_BOLD2_STYLE,
3458 &FORT_FRAME_STYLE,
3459};
3460#define BUILT_IN_STYLES_SZ (sizeof(built_in_styles) / sizeof(built_in_styles[0]))
3461
3462/* todo: remove this stupid and dangerous code */
3463static const struct ft_border_style built_in_external_styles[BUILT_IN_STYLES_SZ] = {
3464 {
3465 {"", "", "", "", "", ""},
3466 {"", "", "", "", "", ""},
3467 ""
3468 }
3469};
3470
3471const struct ft_border_style *const FT_BASIC_STYLE = &built_in_external_styles[0];
3472const struct ft_border_style *const FT_BASIC2_STYLE = &built_in_external_styles[1];
3473const struct ft_border_style *const FT_SIMPLE_STYLE = &built_in_external_styles[2];
3474const struct ft_border_style *const FT_PLAIN_STYLE = &built_in_external_styles[3];
3475const struct ft_border_style *const FT_DOT_STYLE = &built_in_external_styles[4];
3476const struct ft_border_style *const FT_EMPTY_STYLE = &built_in_external_styles[5];
3477const struct ft_border_style *const FT_EMPTY2_STYLE = &built_in_external_styles[6];
3478const struct ft_border_style *const FT_SOLID_STYLE = &built_in_external_styles[7];
3479const struct ft_border_style *const FT_SOLID_ROUND_STYLE = &built_in_external_styles[8];
3480const struct ft_border_style *const FT_NICE_STYLE = &built_in_external_styles[9];
3481const struct ft_border_style *const FT_DOUBLE_STYLE = &built_in_external_styles[10];
3482const struct ft_border_style *const FT_DOUBLE2_STYLE = &built_in_external_styles[11];
3483const struct ft_border_style *const FT_BOLD_STYLE = &built_in_external_styles[12];
3484const struct ft_border_style *const FT_BOLD2_STYLE = &built_in_external_styles[13];
3485const struct ft_border_style *const FT_FRAME_STYLE = &built_in_external_styles[14];
3486
3487static void set_border_props_for_props(f_table_properties_t *properties, const struct ft_border_style *style)
3488{
3489 if (style >= built_in_external_styles && style < (built_in_external_styles + BUILT_IN_STYLES_SZ)) {
3490 size_t pos = (size_t)(style - built_in_external_styles);
3491 memcpy(&(properties->border_style), built_in_styles[pos], sizeof(struct fort_border_style));
3492 return;
3493 }
3494
3495 const struct ft_border_chars *border_chs = &(style->border_chs);
3496 const struct ft_border_chars *header_border_chs = &(style->header_border_chs);
3497
3498#define BOR_CHARS properties->border_style.border_chars
3499#define H_BOR_CHARS properties->border_style.header_border_chars
3500#define SEP_CHARS properties->border_style.separator_chars
3501
3502 BOR_CHARS[TT_bip] = border_chs->top_border_ch;
3503 BOR_CHARS[IH_bip] = border_chs->separator_ch;
3504 BOR_CHARS[BB_bip] = border_chs->bottom_border_ch;
3505 BOR_CHARS[LL_bip] = BOR_CHARS[IV_bip] = BOR_CHARS[RR_bip] = border_chs->side_border_ch;
3506
3507 BOR_CHARS[TL_bip] = BOR_CHARS[TV_bip] = BOR_CHARS[TR_bip] = border_chs->out_intersect_ch;
3508 BOR_CHARS[LH_bip] = BOR_CHARS[RH_bip] = border_chs->out_intersect_ch;
3509 BOR_CHARS[BL_bip] = BOR_CHARS[BV_bip] = BOR_CHARS[BR_bip] = border_chs->out_intersect_ch;
3510 BOR_CHARS[II_bip] = border_chs->in_intersect_ch;
3511
3512 BOR_CHARS[LI_bip] = BOR_CHARS[TI_bip] = BOR_CHARS[RI_bip] = BOR_CHARS[BI_bip] = border_chs->in_intersect_ch;
3513
3514 if (strlen(border_chs->separator_ch) == 0 && strlen(border_chs->in_intersect_ch) == 0) {
3515 BOR_CHARS[LH_bip] = BOR_CHARS[RH_bip] = "\0";
3516 }
3517
3518 H_BOR_CHARS[TT_bip] = header_border_chs->top_border_ch;
3519 H_BOR_CHARS[IH_bip] = header_border_chs->separator_ch;
3520 H_BOR_CHARS[BB_bip] = header_border_chs->bottom_border_ch;
3521 H_BOR_CHARS[LL_bip] = H_BOR_CHARS[IV_bip] = H_BOR_CHARS[RR_bip] = header_border_chs->side_border_ch;
3522
3523 H_BOR_CHARS[TL_bip] = H_BOR_CHARS[TV_bip] = H_BOR_CHARS[TR_bip] = header_border_chs->out_intersect_ch;
3524 H_BOR_CHARS[LH_bip] = H_BOR_CHARS[RH_bip] = header_border_chs->out_intersect_ch;
3525 H_BOR_CHARS[BL_bip] = H_BOR_CHARS[BV_bip] = H_BOR_CHARS[BR_bip] = header_border_chs->out_intersect_ch;
3526 H_BOR_CHARS[II_bip] = header_border_chs->in_intersect_ch;
3527
3528 H_BOR_CHARS[LI_bip] = H_BOR_CHARS[TI_bip] = H_BOR_CHARS[RI_bip] = H_BOR_CHARS[BI_bip] = header_border_chs->in_intersect_ch;
3529
3530 if (strlen(header_border_chs->separator_ch) == 0 && strlen(header_border_chs->in_intersect_ch) == 0) {
3531 BOR_CHARS[LH_bip] = BOR_CHARS[RH_bip] = "\0";
3532 }
3533
3534 SEP_CHARS[LH_sip] = SEP_CHARS[RH_sip] = SEP_CHARS[II_sip] = header_border_chs->out_intersect_ch;
3535 SEP_CHARS[TI_sip] = SEP_CHARS[BI_sip] = header_border_chs->out_intersect_ch;
3536 SEP_CHARS[IH_sip] = style->hor_separator_char;
3537
3538
3539#undef BOR_CHARS
3540#undef H_BOR_CHARS
3541#undef SEP_CHARS
3542}
3543
3544
3545int ft_set_default_border_style(const struct ft_border_style *style)
3546{
3547 set_border_props_for_props(&g_table_properties, style);
3548 return FT_SUCCESS;
3549}
3550
3551int ft_set_border_style(ft_table_t *table, const struct ft_border_style *style)
3552{
3553 assert(table);
3554 if (table->properties == NULL) {
3555 table->properties = create_table_properties();
3556 if (table->properties == NULL)
3557 return FT_MEMORY_ERROR;
3558 }
3559 set_border_props_for_props(table->properties, style);
3560 return FT_SUCCESS;
3561}
3562
3563
3564
3565int ft_set_cell_prop(ft_table_t *table, size_t row, size_t col, uint32_t property, int value)
3566{
3567 assert(table);
3568
3569 if (table->properties == NULL) {
3570 table->properties = create_table_properties();
3571 if (table->properties == NULL)
3572 return FT_MEMORY_ERROR;
3573 }
3574 if (table->properties->cell_properties == NULL) {
3575 table->properties->cell_properties = create_cell_prop_container();
3576 if (table->properties->cell_properties == NULL) {
3577 return FT_GEN_ERROR;
3578 }
3579 }
3580
3581 if (row == FT_CUR_ROW)
3582 row = table->cur_row;
3583 if (col == FT_CUR_COLUMN)
3584 col = table->cur_col;
3585
3586 return set_cell_property(table->properties->cell_properties, row, col, property, value);
3587}
3588
3589int ft_set_default_cell_prop(uint32_t property, int value)
3590{
3591 return set_default_cell_property(property, value);
3592}
3593
3594
3595int ft_set_default_tbl_prop(uint32_t property, int value)
3596{
3597 return set_default_entire_table_property(property, value);
3598}
3599
3600int ft_set_tbl_prop(ft_table_t *table, uint32_t property, int value)
3601{
3602 assert(table);
3603
3604 if (table->properties == NULL) {
3605 table->properties = create_table_properties();
3606 if (table->properties == NULL)
3607 return FT_MEMORY_ERROR;
3608 }
3609 return set_entire_table_property(table->properties, property, value);
3610}
3611
3612void ft_set_memory_funcs(void *(*f_malloc)(size_t size), void (*f_free)(void *ptr))
3613{
3614 set_memory_funcs(f_malloc, f_free);
3615}
3616
3617const char *ft_strerror(int error_code)
3618{
3619 switch (error_code) {
3620 case FT_MEMORY_ERROR:
3621 return "Out of memory";
3622 case FT_GEN_ERROR:
3623 return "General error";
3624 case FT_EINVAL:
3625 return "Invalid argument";
3626 case FT_INTERN_ERROR:
3627 return "Internal libfort error";
3628 default:
3629 if (error_code < 0)
3630 return "Unknown error code";
3631 else
3632 return "Success";
3633 }
3634}
3635
3636int ft_set_cell_span(ft_table_t *table, size_t row, size_t col, size_t hor_span)
3637{
3638 assert(table);
3639 if (hor_span < 2)
3640 return FT_EINVAL;
3641
3642 if (row == FT_CUR_ROW)
3643 row = table->cur_row;
3644 if (row == FT_CUR_COLUMN)
3645 col = table->cur_col;
3646
3647 f_row_t *row_p = get_row_and_create_if_not_exists(table, row);
3648 if (row_p == NULL)
3649 return FT_GEN_ERROR;
3650
3651 return row_set_cell_span(row_p, col, hor_span);
3652}
3653
3654#ifdef FT_HAVE_UTF8
3655
3656int ft_u8nwrite(ft_table_t *table, size_t n, const void *cell_content, ...)
3657{
3658 size_t i = 0;
3659 assert(table);
3660 int status = ft_u8write_impl(table, cell_content);
3661 if (FT_IS_ERROR(status))
3662 return status;
3663
3664 va_list va;
3665 va_start(va, cell_content);
3666 --n;
3667 for (i = 0; i < n; ++i) {
3668 const void *cell = va_arg(va, const void *);
3669 status = ft_u8write_impl(table, cell);
3670 if (FT_IS_ERROR(status)) {
3671 va_end(va);
3672 return status;
3673 }
3674 }
3675 va_end(va);
3676
3677 return status;
3678}
3679
3680int ft_u8nwrite_ln(ft_table_t *table, size_t n, const void *cell_content, ...)
3681{
3682 size_t i = 0;
3683 assert(table);
3684 int status = ft_u8write_impl(table, cell_content);
3685 if (FT_IS_ERROR(status))
3686 return status;
3687
3688 va_list va;
3689 va_start(va, cell_content);
3690 --n;
3691 for (i = 0; i < n; ++i) {
3692 const void *cell = va_arg(va, const void *);
3693 status = ft_u8write_impl(table, cell);
3694 if (FT_IS_ERROR(status)) {
3695 va_end(va);
3696 return status;
3697 }
3698 }
3699 va_end(va);
3700
3701 ft_ln(table);
3702 return status;
3703}
3704
3705FT_PRINTF_ATTRIBUTE_FORMAT(2, 3)
3706int ft_u8printf(ft_table_t *table, const char *fmt, ...)
3707{
3708 assert(table);
3709 va_list va;
3710 va_start(va, fmt);
3711
3712 struct f_string_view fmt_str;
3713 fmt_str.type = UTF8_BUF;
3714 fmt_str.u.cstr = fmt;
3715 int result = ft_row_printf_impl_(table, table->cur_row, &fmt_str, &va);
3716 va_end(va);
3717 return result;
3718}
3719
3720FT_PRINTF_ATTRIBUTE_FORMAT(2, 3)
3721int ft_u8printf_ln(ft_table_t *table, const char *fmt, ...)
3722{
3723 assert(table);
3724 va_list va;
3725 va_start(va, fmt);
3726
3727 struct f_string_view fmt_str;
3728 fmt_str.type = UTF8_BUF;
3729 fmt_str.u.cstr = fmt;
3730 int result = ft_row_printf_impl_(table, table->cur_row, &fmt_str, &va);
3731 if (result >= 0) {
3732 ft_ln(table);
3733 }
3734 va_end(va);
3735 return result;
3736}
3737
3738const void *ft_to_u8string(const ft_table_t *table)
3739{
3740 return (const void *)ft_to_string_impl(table, UTF8_BUF);
3741}
3742
3743void ft_set_u8strwid_func(int (*u8strwid)(const void *beg, const void *end, size_t *width))
3744{
3745 buffer_set_u8strwid_func(u8strwid);
3746}
3747
3748#endif /* FT_HAVE_UTF8 */
3749
3750/********************************************************
3751 End of file "fort_impl.c"
3752 ********************************************************/
3753
3754
3755/********************************************************
3756 Begin of file "fort_utils.c"
3757 ********************************************************/
3758
3759/* #include "fort_utils.h" */ /* Commented by amalgamation script */
3760#ifdef FT_HAVE_WCHAR
3761#include <wchar.h>
3762#endif
3763#if defined(FT_HAVE_UTF8)
3764/* #include "utf8.h" */ /* Commented by amalgamation script */
3765#endif
3766/* #include "string_buffer.h" */ /* Commented by amalgamation script */
3767
3768
3769char g_col_separator = FORT_DEFAULT_COL_SEPARATOR;
3770
3771/*****************************************************************************
3772 * LIBFORT helpers
3773 *****************************************************************************/
3774
3775#if defined(FT_GCC_COMPILER) || defined(FT_CLANG_COMPILER)
3776void *(*fort_malloc)(size_t size) = &malloc;
3777void (*fort_free)(void *ptr) = &free;
3778void *(*fort_calloc)(size_t nmemb, size_t size) = &calloc;
3779void *(*fort_realloc)(void *ptr, size_t size) = &realloc;
3780#else
3781static void *local_malloc(size_t size)
3782{
3783 return malloc(size);
3784}
3785
3786static void local_free(void *ptr)
3787{
3788 free(ptr);
3789}
3790
3791static void *local_calloc(size_t nmemb, size_t size)
3792{
3793 return calloc(nmemb, size);
3794}
3795
3796static void *local_realloc(void *ptr, size_t size)
3797{
3798 return realloc(ptr, size);
3799}
3800
3801void *(*fort_malloc)(size_t size) = &local_malloc;
3802void (*fort_free)(void *ptr) = &local_free;
3803void *(*fort_calloc)(size_t nmemb, size_t size) = &local_calloc;
3804void *(*fort_realloc)(void *ptr, size_t size) = &local_realloc;
3805#endif
3806
3807static void *custom_fort_calloc(size_t nmemb, size_t size)
3808{
3809 size_t total_size = nmemb * size;
3810 void *result = F_MALLOC(total_size);
3811 if (result != NULL)
3812 memset(result, 0, total_size);
3813 return result;
3814}
3815
3816static void *custom_fort_realloc(void *ptr, size_t size)
3817{
3818 if (ptr == NULL)
3819 return F_MALLOC(size);
3820 if (size == 0) {
3821 F_FREE(ptr);
3822 return NULL;
3823 }
3824
3825 void *new_chunk = F_MALLOC(size);
3826 if (new_chunk == NULL)
3827 return NULL;
3828
3829 /*
3830 * In theory we should copy MIN(size, size allocated for ptr) bytes,
3831 * but this is rather dummy implementation so we don't care about it
3832 */
3833 memcpy(new_chunk, ptr, size);
3834 F_FREE(ptr);
3835 return new_chunk;
3836}
3837
3838
3839FT_INTERNAL
3840void set_memory_funcs(void *(*f_malloc)(size_t size), void (*f_free)(void *ptr))
3841{
3842 assert((f_malloc == NULL && f_free == NULL) /* Use std functions */
3843 || (f_malloc != NULL && f_free != NULL) /* Use custom functions */);
3844
3845 if (f_malloc == NULL && f_free == NULL) {
3846#if defined(FT_GCC_COMPILER) || defined(FT_CLANG_COMPILER)
3847 fort_malloc = &malloc;
3848 fort_free = &free;
3849 fort_calloc = &calloc;
3850 fort_realloc = &realloc;
3851#else
3852 fort_malloc = &local_malloc;
3853 fort_free = &local_free;
3854 fort_calloc = &local_calloc;
3855 fort_realloc = &local_realloc;
3856#endif
3857 } else {
3858 fort_malloc = f_malloc;
3859 fort_free = f_free;
3860 fort_calloc = &custom_fort_calloc;
3861 fort_realloc = &custom_fort_realloc;
3862 }
3863
3864}
3865
3866FT_INTERNAL
3867char *fort_strdup(const char *str)
3868{
3869 if (str == NULL)
3870 return NULL;
3871
3872 size_t sz = strlen(str);
3873 char *str_copy = (char *)F_MALLOC((sz + 1) * sizeof(char));
3874 if (str_copy == NULL)
3875 return NULL;
3876
3877 strcpy(str_copy, str);
3878 return str_copy;
3879}
3880
3881#if defined(FT_HAVE_WCHAR)
3882FT_INTERNAL
3883wchar_t *fort_wcsdup(const wchar_t *str)
3884{
3885 if (str == NULL)
3886 return NULL;
3887
3888 size_t sz = wcslen(str);
3889 wchar_t *str_copy = (wchar_t *)F_MALLOC((sz + 1) * sizeof(wchar_t));
3890 if (str_copy == NULL)
3891 return NULL;
3892
3893 wcscpy(str_copy, str);
3894 return str_copy;
3895}
3896#endif
3897
3898
3899static
3900size_t columns_number_in_fmt_string(const char *fmt)
3901{
3902 size_t separator_counter = 0;
3903 const char *pos = fmt;
3904 while (1) {
3905 pos = strchr(pos, g_col_separator);
3906 if (pos == NULL)
3907 break;
3908
3909 separator_counter++;
3910 ++pos;
3911 }
3912 return separator_counter + 1;
3913}
3914
3915#if defined(FT_HAVE_WCHAR)
3916static
3917size_t columns_number_in_fmt_wstring(const wchar_t *fmt)
3918{
3919 size_t separator_counter = 0;
3920 const wchar_t *pos = fmt;
3921 while (1) {
3922 pos = wcschr(pos, g_col_separator);
3923 if (pos == NULL)
3924 break;
3925
3926 separator_counter++;
3927 ++pos;
3928 }
3929 return separator_counter + 1;
3930}
3931#endif
3932
3933#if defined(FT_HAVE_UTF8)
3934static
3935size_t columns_number_in_fmt_u8string(const void *fmt)
3936{
3937 size_t separator_counter = 0;
3938 const char *pos = (const char *)fmt;
3939 while (1) {
3940 pos = (const char *)utf8chr(pos, g_col_separator);
3941 if (pos == NULL)
3942 break;
3943
3944 separator_counter++;
3945 ++pos;
3946 }
3947 return separator_counter + 1;
3948}
3949#endif
3950
3951FT_INTERNAL
3952size_t number_of_columns_in_format_string(const f_string_view_t *fmt)
3953{
3954 switch (fmt->type) {
3955 case CHAR_BUF:
3956 return columns_number_in_fmt_string(fmt->u.cstr);
3957#ifdef FT_HAVE_WCHAR
3958 case W_CHAR_BUF:
3959 return columns_number_in_fmt_wstring(fmt->u.wstr);
3960#endif /* FT_HAVE_WCHAR */
3961#ifdef FT_HAVE_UTF8
3962 case UTF8_BUF:
3963 return columns_number_in_fmt_u8string(fmt->u.u8str);
3964#endif /* FT_HAVE_UTF8 */
3965 default:
3966 assert(0);
3967 }
3968 return 0;
3969}
3970
3971FT_INTERNAL
3972size_t number_of_columns_in_format_buffer(const f_string_buffer_t *fmt)
3973{
3974 switch (fmt->type) {
3975 case CHAR_BUF:
3976 return columns_number_in_fmt_string(fmt->str.cstr);
3977#ifdef FT_HAVE_WCHAR
3978 case W_CHAR_BUF:
3979 return columns_number_in_fmt_wstring(fmt->str.wstr);
3980#endif /* FT_HAVE_WCHAR */
3981#ifdef FT_HAVE_UTF8
3982 case UTF8_BUF:
3983 return columns_number_in_fmt_u8string(fmt->str.u8str);
3984#endif /* FT_HAVE_UTF8 */
3985 default:
3986 assert(0);
3987 }
3988 return 0;
3989}
3990
3991static
3992int snprint_n_strings_impl(char *buf, size_t length, size_t n, const char *str)
3993{
3994 size_t str_len = strlen(str);
3995 if (length <= n * str_len)
3996 return -1;
3997
3998 if (n == 0)
3999 return 0;
4000
4001 /* To ensure valid return value it is safely not print such big strings */
4002 if (n * str_len > INT_MAX)
4003 return -1;
4004
4005 if (str_len == 0)
4006 return 0;
4007
4008 int status = snprintf(buf, length, "%0*d", (int)(n * str_len), 0);
4009 if (status < 0)
4010 return status;
4011
4012 size_t i = 0;
4013 for (i = 0; i < n; ++i) {
4014 const char *str_p = str;
4015 while (*str_p)
4016 *(buf++) = *(str_p++);
4017 }
4018 return (int)(n * str_len);
4019}
4020
4021static
4022int snprint_n_strings(f_conv_context_t *cntx, size_t n, const char *str)
4023{
4024 int w = snprint_n_strings_impl(cntx->u.buf, cntx->raw_avail, n, str);
4025 if (w >= 0) {
4026 cntx->u.buf += w;
4027 cntx->raw_avail -= w;
4028 }
4029 return w;
4030}
4031
4032#if defined(FT_HAVE_WCHAR)
4033static
4034int wsnprint_n_string(wchar_t *buf, size_t length, size_t n, const char *str);
4035#endif
4036
4037#if defined(FT_HAVE_UTF8)
4038static
4039int u8nprint_n_strings(void *buf, size_t length, size_t n, const void *str);
4040#endif
4041
4042
4043FT_INTERNAL
4044int print_n_strings(f_conv_context_t *cntx, size_t n, const char *str)
4045{
4046 int cod_w;
4047 int raw_written;
4048
4049 switch (cntx->b_type) {
4050 case CHAR_BUF:
4051 raw_written = snprint_n_strings(cntx, n, str);
4052 cod_w = raw_written;
4053 return cod_w;
4054#ifdef FT_HAVE_WCHAR
4055 case W_CHAR_BUF:
4056 cod_w = wsnprint_n_string(cntx->u.wbuf, cntx->raw_avail, n, str);
4057 if (cod_w < 0)
4058 return cod_w;
4059 raw_written = sizeof(wchar_t) * cod_w;
4060
4061 cntx->u.buf += raw_written;
4062 cntx->raw_avail -= raw_written;
4063 return cod_w;
4064#endif /* FT_HAVE_WCHAR */
4065#ifdef FT_HAVE_UTF8
4066 case UTF8_BUF:
4067 /* Everying is very strange and differs with W_CHAR_BUF */
4068 raw_written = u8nprint_n_strings(cntx->u.buf, cntx->raw_avail, n, str);
4069 if (raw_written < 0) {
4070 fprintf(stderr, " raw_written = %d\n", raw_written);
4071 return raw_written;
4072 }
4073
4074 cntx->u.buf += raw_written;
4075 cntx->raw_avail -= raw_written;
4076 return (int) (utf8len(str) * n);
4077#endif /* FT_HAVE_UTF8 */
4078 default:
4079 assert(0);
4080 return -1;
4081 }
4082}
4083
4084FT_INTERNAL
4085int ft_nprint(f_conv_context_t *cntx, const char *str, size_t strlen)
4086{
4087 if (cntx->raw_avail + 1/* for 0 */ < strlen)
4088 return -1;
4089
4090 memcpy(cntx->u.buf, str, strlen);
4091 cntx->u.buf += strlen;
4092 cntx->raw_avail -= strlen;
4093 *cntx->u.buf = '\0'; /* Do we need this ? */
4094 return (int) (strlen);
4095}
4096
4097#ifdef FT_HAVE_WCHAR
4098int ft_nwprint(f_conv_context_t *cntx, const wchar_t *str, uint64_t strlen)
4099{
4100 if (cntx->raw_avail + 1/* for 0 */ < strlen)
4101 return -1;
4102
4103 int raw_len = (int)(strlen * sizeof(wchar_t));
4104
4105 memcpy(cntx->u.buf, str, raw_len);
4106 cntx->u.buf += raw_len;
4107 cntx->raw_avail -= raw_len;
4108
4109 /* Do we need this ? */
4110 wchar_t end_of_string = L'\0';
4111 memcpy(cntx->u.buf, &end_of_string, sizeof(wchar_t));
4112 return (int) strlen;
4113}
4114#endif /* FT_HAVE_WCHAR */
4115
4116#ifdef FT_HAVE_UTF8
4117FT_INTERNAL
4118int ft_nu8print(f_conv_context_t *cntx, const void *beg, const void *end)
4119{
4120 const char *bc = (const char *)beg;
4121 const char *ec = (const char *)end;
4122 uint64_t raw_len = (ec - bc);
4123 if (cntx->raw_avail + 1 < raw_len)
4124 return -1;
4125
4126 memcpy(cntx->u.buf, beg, raw_len);
4127 cntx->u.buf += raw_len;
4128 cntx->raw_avail -= raw_len;
4129 *(cntx->u.buf) = '\0'; /* Do we need this ? */
4130 return (int)raw_len; /* what return here ? */
4131}
4132#endif /* FT_HAVE_UTF8 */
4133
4134#if defined(FT_HAVE_WCHAR)
4135#define WCS_SIZE 64
4136
4137static
4138int wsnprint_n_string(wchar_t *buf, size_t length, size_t n, const char *str)
4139{
4140 size_t str_len = strlen(str);
4141
4142 /* note: maybe it's, better to return -1 in case of multibyte character
4143 * strings (not sure this case is done correctly).
4144 */
4145 if (str_len > 1) {
4146 const unsigned char *p = (const unsigned char *)str;
4147 while (*p) {
4148 if (*p <= 127)
4149 p++;
4150 else {
4151 wchar_t wcs[WCS_SIZE];
4152 const char *ptr = str;
4153 size_t wcs_len;
4154 mbstate_t mbst;
4155 memset(&mbst, 0, sizeof(mbst));
4156 wcs_len = mbsrtowcs(wcs, (const char **)&ptr, WCS_SIZE, &mbst);
4157 /* for simplicity */
4158 if ((wcs_len == (size_t) - 1) || wcs_len > 1) {
4159 return -1;
4160 } else {
4161 wcs[wcs_len] = L'\0';
4162 size_t k = n;
4163 while (k) {
4164 *buf = *wcs;
4165 ++buf;
4166 --k;
4167 }
4168 buf[n] = L'\0';
4169 return (int)n;
4170 }
4171 }
4172 }
4173 }
4174
4175 if (length <= n * str_len)
4176 return -1;
4177
4178 if (n == 0)
4179 return 0;
4180
4181 /* To ensure valid return value it is safely not print such big strings */
4182 if (n * str_len > INT_MAX)
4183 return -1;
4184
4185 if (str_len == 0)
4186 return 0;
4187
4188 int status = swprintf(buf, length, L"%0*d", (int)(n * str_len), 0);
4189 if (status < 0)
4190 return status;
4191
4192 size_t i = 0;
4193 for (i = 0; i < n; ++i) {
4194 const char *str_p = str;
4195 while (*str_p)
4196 *(buf++) = (wchar_t) * (str_p++);
4197 }
4198 return (int)(n * str_len);
4199}
4200#endif
4201
4202
4203#if defined(FT_HAVE_UTF8)
4204static
4205int u8nprint_n_strings(void *buf, size_t length, size_t n, const void *str)
4206{
4207 size_t str_size = utf8size(str) - 1; /* str_size - raw size in bytes, excluding \0 */
4208 if (length <= n * str_size)
4209 return -1;
4210
4211 if (n == 0)
4212 return 0;
4213
4214 /* To ensure valid return value it is safely not print such big strings */
4215 if (n * str_size > INT_MAX)
4216 return -1;
4217
4218 if (str_size == 0)
4219 return 0;
4220
4221 size_t i = n;
4222 while (i) {
4223 memcpy(buf, str, str_size);
4224 buf = (char *)buf + str_size;
4225 --i;
4226 }
4227 *(char *)buf = '\0';
4228 return (int)(n * str_size);
4229}
4230#endif
4231
4232/********************************************************
4233 End of file "fort_utils.c"
4234 ********************************************************/
4235
4236
4237/********************************************************
4238 Begin of file "properties.c"
4239 ********************************************************/
4240
4241/* #include "fort_utils.h" */ /* Commented by amalgamation script */
4242#include <assert.h>
4243/* #include "properties.h" */ /* Commented by amalgamation script */
4244/* #include "vector.h" */ /* Commented by amalgamation script */
4245
4246#define FT_RESET_COLOR "\033[0m"
4247
4248static const char *fg_colors[] = {
4249 "",
4250 "\033[30m",
4251 "\033[31m",
4252 "\033[32m",
4253 "\033[33m",
4254 "\033[34m",
4255 "\033[35m",
4256 "\033[36m",
4257 "\033[37m",
4258 "\033[90m",
4259 "\033[91m",
4260 "\033[92m",
4261 "\033[93m",
4262 "\033[94m",
4263 "\033[95m",
4264 "\033[96m",
4265 "\033[97m",
4266};
4267
4268static const char *bg_colors[] = {
4269 "",
4270 "\033[40m",
4271 "\033[41m",
4272 "\033[42m",
4273 "\033[43m",
4274 "\033[44m",
4275 "\033[45m",
4276 "\033[46m",
4277 "\033[47m",
4278 "\033[100m",
4279 "\033[101m",
4280 "\033[102m",
4281 "\033[103m",
4282 "\033[104m",
4283 "\033[105m",
4284 "\033[106m",
4285 "\033[107m",
4286};
4287
4288static const char *text_styles[] = {
4289 "",
4290 "\033[1m",
4291 "\033[2m",
4292 "\033[3m",
4293 "\033[4m",
4294 "\033[5m",
4295 "\033[7m",
4296 "\033[8m",
4297};
4298
4299#define UNIVERSAL_RESET_TAG "\033[0m"
4300
4301static const size_t n_fg_colors = sizeof(fg_colors) / sizeof(fg_colors[0]);
4302static const size_t n_bg_colors = sizeof(bg_colors) / sizeof(bg_colors[0]);
4303static const size_t n_styles = sizeof(text_styles) / sizeof(text_styles[0]);
4304
4305void get_style_tag_for_cell(const f_table_properties_t *props,
4306 size_t row, size_t col, char *style_tag, size_t sz)
4307{
4308 (void)sz;
4309 size_t i = 0;
4310
4311 unsigned bg_color_number = get_cell_property_hierarchically(props, row, col, FT_CPROP_CELL_BG_COLOR);
4312 unsigned text_style = get_cell_property_hierarchically(props, row, col, FT_CPROP_CELL_TEXT_STYLE);
4313
4314 style_tag[0] = '\0';
4315
4316 if (text_style < (1U << n_styles)) {
4317 for (i = 0; i < n_styles; ++i) {
4318 if (text_style & (1 << i)) {
4319 strcat(style_tag, text_styles[i]);
4320 }
4321 }
4322 } else {
4323 goto error;
4324 }
4325
4326 if (bg_color_number < n_bg_colors) {
4327 strcat(style_tag, bg_colors[bg_color_number]);
4328 } else {
4329 goto error;
4330 }
4331
4332 return;
4333
4334error:
4335 /* shouldn't be here */
4336 assert(0);
4337 style_tag[0] = '\0';
4338 return;
4339}
4340
4341void get_reset_style_tag_for_cell(const f_table_properties_t *props,
4342 size_t row, size_t col, char *reset_style_tag, size_t sz)
4343{
4344 (void)sz;
4345 size_t i = 0;
4346
4347 unsigned bg_color_number = get_cell_property_hierarchically(props, row, col, FT_CPROP_CELL_BG_COLOR);
4348 unsigned text_style = get_cell_property_hierarchically(props, row, col, FT_CPROP_CELL_TEXT_STYLE);
4349
4350 reset_style_tag[0] = '\0';
4351
4352 if (text_style < (1U << n_styles)) {
4353 for (i = 0; i < n_styles; ++i) {
4354 if (text_style & (1 << i)) {
4355 if (i != 0) // FT_TSTYLE_DEFAULT
4356 goto reset_style;
4357 }
4358 }
4359 } else {
4360 goto error;
4361 }
4362
4363 if (bg_color_number < n_bg_colors) {
4364 if (bg_color_number)
4365 goto reset_style;
4366 } else {
4367 goto error;
4368 }
4369
4370 return;
4371
4372
4373reset_style:
4374 strcat(reset_style_tag, UNIVERSAL_RESET_TAG);
4375 return;
4376
4377error:
4378 /* shouldn't be here */
4379 assert(0);
4380 reset_style_tag[0] = '\0';
4381 return;
4382}
4383
4384
4385void get_style_tag_for_content(const f_table_properties_t *props,
4386 size_t row, size_t col, char *style_tag, size_t sz)
4387{
4388 (void)sz;
4389 size_t i = 0;
4390
4391 unsigned text_style = get_cell_property_hierarchically(props, row, col, FT_CPROP_CONT_TEXT_STYLE);
4392 unsigned fg_color_number = get_cell_property_hierarchically(props, row, col, FT_CPROP_CONT_FG_COLOR);
4393 unsigned bg_color_number = get_cell_property_hierarchically(props, row, col, FT_CPROP_CONT_BG_COLOR);
4394
4395 style_tag[0] = '\0';
4396
4397 if (text_style < (1U << n_styles)) {
4398 for (i = 0; i < n_styles; ++i) {
4399 if (text_style & (1 << i)) {
4400 strcat(style_tag, text_styles[i]);
4401 }
4402 }
4403 } else {
4404 goto error;
4405 }
4406
4407 if (fg_color_number < n_fg_colors) {
4408 if (fg_color_number)
4409 strcat(style_tag, fg_colors[fg_color_number]);
4410 } else {
4411 goto error;
4412 }
4413
4414 if (bg_color_number < n_bg_colors) {
4415 strcat(style_tag, bg_colors[bg_color_number]);
4416 } else {
4417 goto error;
4418 }
4419
4420 return;
4421
4422error:
4423 /* shouldn't be here */
4424 assert(0);
4425 style_tag[0] = '\0';
4426 return;
4427}
4428
4429void get_reset_style_tag_for_content(const f_table_properties_t *props,
4430 size_t row, size_t col, char *reset_style_tag, size_t sz)
4431{
4432 (void)sz;
4433 size_t i = 0;
4434 size_t len = 0;
4435
4436 unsigned text_style = get_cell_property_hierarchically(props, row, col, FT_CPROP_CONT_TEXT_STYLE);
4437 unsigned fg_color_number = get_cell_property_hierarchically(props, row, col, FT_CPROP_CONT_FG_COLOR);
4438 unsigned bg_color_number = get_cell_property_hierarchically(props, row, col, FT_CPROP_CONT_BG_COLOR);
4439
4440 reset_style_tag[0] = '\0';
4441
4442 if (text_style < (1U << n_styles)) {
4443 for (i = 0; i < n_styles; ++i) {
4444 if (text_style & (1 << i)) {
4445 if (i != 0) // FT_TSTYLE_DEFAULT
4446 goto reset_style;
4447 }
4448 }
4449 } else {
4450 goto error;
4451 }
4452
4453 if (fg_color_number < n_fg_colors) {
4454 if (fg_color_number)
4455 goto reset_style;
4456 } else {
4457 goto error;
4458 }
4459
4460 if (bg_color_number < n_bg_colors) {
4461 if (bg_color_number)
4462 goto reset_style;
4463 } else {
4464 goto error;
4465 }
4466
4467 return;
4468
4469
4470reset_style:
4471 strcat(reset_style_tag, UNIVERSAL_RESET_TAG);
4472 len = strlen(reset_style_tag);
4473 get_style_tag_for_cell(props, row, col, reset_style_tag + len, sz - len);
4474 return;
4475
4476error:
4477 /* shouldn't be here */
4478 assert(0);
4479 reset_style_tag[0] = '\0';
4480 return;
4481}
4482
4483
4484static struct f_cell_props g_default_cell_properties = {
4485 FT_ANY_ROW, /* cell_row */
4486 FT_ANY_COLUMN, /* cell_col */
4487
4488 /* properties_flags */
4489 FT_CPROP_MIN_WIDTH | FT_CPROP_TEXT_ALIGN | FT_CPROP_TOP_PADDING
4490 | FT_CPROP_BOTTOM_PADDING | FT_CPROP_LEFT_PADDING | FT_CPROP_RIGHT_PADDING
4491 | FT_CPROP_EMPTY_STR_HEIGHT | FT_CPROP_CONT_FG_COLOR | FT_CPROP_CELL_BG_COLOR
4492 | FT_CPROP_CONT_BG_COLOR | FT_CPROP_CELL_TEXT_STYLE | FT_CPROP_CONT_TEXT_STYLE,
4493
4494 0, /* col_min_width */
4495 FT_ALIGNED_LEFT, /* align */
4496 0, /* cell_padding_top */
4497 0, /* cell_padding_bottom */
4498 1, /* cell_padding_left */
4499 1, /* cell_padding_right */
4500 1, /* cell_empty_string_height */
4501
4502 FT_ROW_COMMON, /* row_type */
4503 FT_COLOR_DEFAULT, /* content_fg_color_number */
4504 FT_COLOR_DEFAULT, /* content_bg_color_number */
4505 FT_COLOR_DEFAULT, /* cell_bg_color_number */
4506 FT_TSTYLE_DEFAULT, /* cell_text_style */
4507 FT_TSTYLE_DEFAULT, /* content_text_style */
4508};
4509
4510static int get_prop_value_if_exists_otherwise_default(const struct f_cell_props *cell_opts, uint32_t property)
4511{
4512 if (cell_opts == NULL || !PROP_IS_SET(cell_opts->properties_flags, property)) {
4513 cell_opts = &g_default_cell_properties;
4514 }
4515
4516 switch (property) {
4517 case FT_CPROP_MIN_WIDTH:
4518 return cell_opts->col_min_width;
4519 case FT_CPROP_TEXT_ALIGN:
4520 return cell_opts->align;
4521 case FT_CPROP_TOP_PADDING:
4522 return cell_opts->cell_padding_top;
4523 case FT_CPROP_BOTTOM_PADDING:
4524 return cell_opts->cell_padding_bottom;
4525 case FT_CPROP_LEFT_PADDING:
4526 return cell_opts->cell_padding_left;
4527 case FT_CPROP_RIGHT_PADDING:
4528 return cell_opts->cell_padding_right;
4529 case FT_CPROP_EMPTY_STR_HEIGHT:
4530 return cell_opts->cell_empty_string_height;
4531 case FT_CPROP_ROW_TYPE:
4532 return cell_opts->row_type;
4533 case FT_CPROP_CONT_FG_COLOR:
4534 return cell_opts->content_fg_color_number;
4535 case FT_CPROP_CONT_BG_COLOR:
4536 return cell_opts->content_bg_color_number;
4537 case FT_CPROP_CELL_BG_COLOR:
4538 return cell_opts->cell_bg_color_number;
4539 case FT_CPROP_CELL_TEXT_STYLE:
4540 return cell_opts->cell_text_style;
4541 case FT_CPROP_CONT_TEXT_STYLE:
4542 return cell_opts->content_text_style;
4543 default:
4544 /* todo: implement later */
4545 exit(333);
4546 }
4547}
4548
4549
4550FT_INTERNAL
4551f_cell_prop_container_t *create_cell_prop_container(void)
4552{
4553 f_cell_prop_container_t *ret = create_vector(sizeof(f_cell_props_t), DEFAULT_VECTOR_CAPACITY);
4554 return ret;
4555}
4556
4557
4558FT_INTERNAL
4559void destroy_cell_prop_container(f_cell_prop_container_t *cont)
4560{
4561 if (cont)
4562 destroy_vector(cont);
4563}
4564
4565
4566FT_INTERNAL
4567const f_cell_props_t *cget_cell_prop(const f_cell_prop_container_t *cont, size_t row, size_t col)
4568{
4569 assert(cont);
4570 size_t sz = vector_size(cont);
4571 size_t i = 0;
4572 for (i = 0; i < sz; ++i) {
4573 const f_cell_props_t *opt = &VECTOR_AT_C(cont, i, const f_cell_props_t);
4574 if (opt->cell_row == row && opt->cell_col == col)
4575 return opt;
4576 }
4577 return NULL;
4578}
4579
4580
4581FT_INTERNAL
4582f_cell_props_t *get_cell_prop_and_create_if_not_exists(f_cell_prop_container_t *cont, size_t row, size_t col)
4583{
4584 assert(cont);
4585 size_t sz = vector_size(cont);
4586 size_t i = 0;
4587 for (i = 0; i < sz; ++i) {
4588 f_cell_props_t *opt = &VECTOR_AT(cont, i, f_cell_props_t);
4589 if (opt->cell_row == row && opt->cell_col == col)
4590 return opt;
4591 }
4592
4593 f_cell_props_t opt;
4594 if (row == FT_ANY_ROW && col == FT_ANY_COLUMN)
4595 memcpy(&opt, &g_default_cell_properties, sizeof(f_cell_props_t));
4596 else
4597 memset(&opt, 0, sizeof(f_cell_props_t));
4598
4599 opt.cell_row = row;
4600 opt.cell_col = col;
4601 if (FT_IS_SUCCESS(vector_push(cont, &opt))) {
4602 return &VECTOR_AT(cont, sz, f_cell_props_t);
4603 }
4604
4605 return NULL;
4606}
4607
4608
4609FT_INTERNAL
4610int get_cell_property_hierarchically(const f_table_properties_t *propertiess, size_t row, size_t column, uint32_t property)
4611{
4612 assert(propertiess);
4613 size_t row_origin = row;
4614
4615 const f_cell_props_t *opt = NULL;
4616 if (propertiess->cell_properties != NULL) {
4617 while (1) {
4618 opt = cget_cell_prop(propertiess->cell_properties, row, column);
4619 if (opt != NULL && PROP_IS_SET(opt->properties_flags, property))
4620 break;
4621
4622 if (row != FT_ANY_ROW && column != FT_ANY_COLUMN) {
4623 row = FT_ANY_ROW;
4624 continue;
4625 } else if (row == FT_ANY_ROW && column != FT_ANY_COLUMN) {
4626 row = row_origin;
4627 column = FT_ANY_COLUMN;
4628 continue;
4629 } else if (row != FT_ANY_ROW && column == FT_ANY_COLUMN) {
4630 row = FT_ANY_ROW;
4631 column = FT_ANY_COLUMN;
4632 continue;
4633 }
4634
4635 opt = NULL;
4636 break;
4637 }
4638 }
4639
4640 return get_prop_value_if_exists_otherwise_default(opt, property);
4641}
4642
4643
4644static f_status set_cell_property_impl(f_cell_props_t *opt, uint32_t property, int value)
4645{
4646 assert(opt);
4647
4648 PROP_SET(opt->properties_flags, property);
4649 if (PROP_IS_SET(property, FT_CPROP_MIN_WIDTH)) {
4650 CHECK_NOT_NEGATIVE(value);
4651 opt->col_min_width = value;
4652 } else if (PROP_IS_SET(property, FT_CPROP_TEXT_ALIGN)) {
4653 opt->align = (enum ft_text_alignment)value;
4654 } else if (PROP_IS_SET(property, FT_CPROP_TOP_PADDING)) {
4655 CHECK_NOT_NEGATIVE(value);
4656 opt->cell_padding_top = value;
4657 } else if (PROP_IS_SET(property, FT_CPROP_BOTTOM_PADDING)) {
4658 CHECK_NOT_NEGATIVE(value);
4659 opt->cell_padding_bottom = value;
4660 } else if (PROP_IS_SET(property, FT_CPROP_LEFT_PADDING)) {
4661 CHECK_NOT_NEGATIVE(value);
4662 opt->cell_padding_left = value;
4663 } else if (PROP_IS_SET(property, FT_CPROP_RIGHT_PADDING)) {
4664 CHECK_NOT_NEGATIVE(value);
4665 opt->cell_padding_right = value;
4666 } else if (PROP_IS_SET(property, FT_CPROP_EMPTY_STR_HEIGHT)) {
4667 CHECK_NOT_NEGATIVE(value);
4668 opt->cell_empty_string_height = value;
4669 } else if (PROP_IS_SET(property, FT_CPROP_ROW_TYPE)) {
4670 opt->row_type = (enum ft_row_type)value;
4671 } else if (PROP_IS_SET(property, FT_CPROP_CONT_FG_COLOR)) {
4672 opt->content_fg_color_number = value;
4673 } else if (PROP_IS_SET(property, FT_CPROP_CONT_BG_COLOR)) {
4674 opt->content_bg_color_number = value;
4675 } else if (PROP_IS_SET(property, FT_CPROP_CELL_BG_COLOR)) {
4676 opt->cell_bg_color_number = value;
4677 } else if (PROP_IS_SET(property, FT_CPROP_CELL_TEXT_STYLE)) {
4678 enum ft_text_style v = (enum ft_text_style)value;
4679 if (v == FT_TSTYLE_DEFAULT) {
4680 opt->cell_text_style = FT_TSTYLE_DEFAULT;
4681 } else {
4682 opt->cell_text_style = (enum ft_text_style)(opt->cell_text_style | v);
4683 }
4684 } else if (PROP_IS_SET(property, FT_CPROP_CONT_TEXT_STYLE)) {
4685 enum ft_text_style v = (enum ft_text_style)value;
4686 if (v == FT_TSTYLE_DEFAULT) {
4687 opt->content_text_style = v;
4688 } else {
4689 opt->content_text_style = (enum ft_text_style)(opt->content_text_style | v);
4690 }
4691 }
4692
4693 return FT_SUCCESS;
4694
4695fort_fail:
4696 return FT_EINVAL;
4697}
4698
4699
4700FT_INTERNAL
4701f_status set_cell_property(f_cell_prop_container_t *cont, size_t row, size_t col, uint32_t property, int value)
4702{
4703 f_cell_props_t *opt = get_cell_prop_and_create_if_not_exists(cont, row, col);
4704 if (opt == NULL)
4705 return FT_GEN_ERROR;
4706
4707 return set_cell_property_impl(opt, property, value);
4708 /*
4709 PROP_SET(opt->propertiess, property);
4710 if (PROP_IS_SET(property, FT_CPROP_MIN_WIDTH)) {
4711 opt->col_min_width = value;
4712 } else if (PROP_IS_SET(property, FT_CPROP_TEXT_ALIGN)) {
4713 opt->align = value;
4714 }
4715
4716 return FT_SUCCESS;
4717 */
4718}
4719
4720
4721FT_INTERNAL
4722f_status set_default_cell_property(uint32_t property, int value)
4723{
4724 return set_cell_property_impl(&g_default_cell_properties, property, value);
4725}
4726
