5092
5093
5094struct fort_border_style FORT_BASIC_STYLE = BASIC_STYLE;
5095struct fort_border_style FORT_BASIC2_STYLE = BASIC2_STYLE;
5096struct fort_border_style FORT_SIMPLE_STYLE = SIMPLE_STYLE;
5097struct fort_border_style FORT_PLAIN_STYLE = PLAIN_STYLE;
5098struct fort_border_style FORT_DOT_STYLE = DOT_STYLE;
5099struct fort_border_style FORT_EMPTY_STYLE = EMPTY_STYLE;
5100struct fort_border_style FORT_EMPTY2_STYLE = EMPTY2_STYLE;
5101struct fort_border_style FORT_SOLID_STYLE = SOLID_STYLE;
5102struct fort_border_style FORT_SOLID_ROUND_STYLE = SOLID_ROUND_STYLE;
5103struct fort_border_style FORT_NICE_STYLE = NICE_STYLE;
5104struct fort_border_style FORT_DOUBLE_STYLE = DOUBLE_STYLE;
5105struct fort_border_style FORT_DOUBLE2_STYLE = DOUBLE2_STYLE;
5106struct fort_border_style FORT_BOLD_STYLE = BOLD_STYLE;
5107struct fort_border_style FORT_BOLD2_STYLE = BOLD2_STYLE;
5108struct fort_border_style FORT_FRAME_STYLE = FRAME_STYLE;
5109
5110
5111
5112fort_entire_table_properties_t g_entire_table_properties = {
5113 0, /* left_margin */
5114 0, /* top_margin */
5115 0, /* right_margin */
5116 0, /* bottom_margin */
5117 FT_STRATEGY_REPLACE, /* add_strategy */
5118};
5119
5120static f_status set_entire_table_property_internal(fort_entire_table_properties_t *properties, uint32_t property, int value)
5121{
5122 assert(properties);
5123 CHECK_NOT_NEGATIVE(value);
5124 if (PROP_IS_SET(property, FT_TPROP_LEFT_MARGIN)) {
5125 properties->left_margin = value;
5126 } else if (PROP_IS_SET(property, FT_TPROP_TOP_MARGIN)) {
5127 properties->top_margin = value;
5128 } else if (PROP_IS_SET(property, FT_TPROP_RIGHT_MARGIN)) {
5129 properties->right_margin = value;
5130 } else if (PROP_IS_SET(property, FT_TPROP_BOTTOM_MARGIN)) {
5131 properties->bottom_margin = value;
5132 } else if (PROP_IS_SET(property, FT_TPROP_ADDING_STRATEGY)) {
5133 properties->add_strategy = (enum ft_adding_strategy)value;
5134 } else {
5135 return FT_EINVAL;
5136 }
5137 return FT_SUCCESS;
5138
5139fort_fail:
5140 return FT_EINVAL;
5141}
5142
5143
5144FT_INTERNAL
5145f_status set_entire_table_property(f_table_properties_t *table_properties, uint32_t property, int value)
5146{
5147 assert(table_properties);
5148 return set_entire_table_property_internal(&table_properties->entire_table_properties, property, value);
5149}
5150
5151
5152FT_INTERNAL
5153f_status set_default_entire_table_property(uint32_t property, int value)
5154{
5155 return set_entire_table_property_internal(&g_entire_table_properties, property, value);
5156}
5157
5158
5159FT_INTERNAL
5160size_t max_border_elem_strlen(struct f_table_properties *properties)
5161{
5162 assert(properties);
5163 size_t result = 1;
5164 int i = 0;
5165 for (i = 0; i < BORDER_ITEM_POS_SIZE; ++i) {
5166 result = MAX(result, strlen(properties->border_style.border_chars[i]));
5167 }
5168
5169 for (i = 0; i < BORDER_ITEM_POS_SIZE; ++i) {
5170 result = MAX(result, strlen(properties->border_style.header_border_chars[i]));
5171 }
5172
5173 for (i = 0; i < SEPARATOR_ITEM_POS_SIZE; ++i) {
5174 result = MAX(result, strlen(properties->border_style.separator_chars[i]));
5175 }
5176 return result;
5177}
5178
5179
5180f_table_properties_t g_table_properties = {
5181 /* border_style */
5182 BASIC_STYLE,
5183 NULL, /* cell_properties */
5184 /* entire_table_properties */
5185 {
5186 0, /* left_margin */
5187 0, /* top_margin */
5188 0, /* right_margin */
5189 0, /* bottom_margin */
5190 FT_STRATEGY_REPLACE, /* add_strategy */
5191 }
5192};
5193
5194
5195FT_INTERNAL
5196f_table_properties_t *create_table_properties(void)
5197{
5198 f_table_properties_t *properties = (f_table_properties_t *)F_CALLOC(sizeof(f_table_properties_t), 1);
5199 if (properties == NULL) {
5200 return NULL;
5201 }
5202 memcpy(properties, &g_table_properties, sizeof(f_table_properties_t));
5203 properties->cell_properties = create_cell_prop_container();
5204 if (properties->cell_properties == NULL) {
5205 destroy_table_properties(properties);
5206 return NULL;
5207 }
5208 memcpy(&properties->entire_table_properties, &g_entire_table_properties, sizeof(fort_entire_table_properties_t));
5209 return properties;
5210}
5211
5212FT_INTERNAL
5213void destroy_table_properties(f_table_properties_t *properties)
5214{
5215 if (properties == NULL)
5216 return;
5217
5218 if (properties->cell_properties != NULL) {
5219 destroy_cell_prop_container(properties->cell_properties);
5220 }
5221 F_FREE(properties);
5222}
5223
5224static
5225f_cell_prop_container_t *copy_cell_properties(f_cell_prop_container_t *cont)
5226{
5227 f_cell_prop_container_t *result = create_cell_prop_container();
5228 if (result == NULL)
5229 return NULL;
5230
5231 size_t i = 0;
5232 size_t sz = vector_size(cont);
5233 for (i = 0; i < sz; ++i) {
5234 f_cell_props_t *opt = (f_cell_props_t *)vector_at(cont, i);
5235 if (FT_IS_ERROR(vector_push(result, opt))) {
5236 destroy_cell_prop_container(result);
5237 return NULL;
5238 }
5239 }
5240 return result;
5241}
5242
5243FT_INTERNAL
5244f_table_properties_t *copy_table_properties(const f_table_properties_t *properties)
5245{
5246 f_table_properties_t *new_opt = create_table_properties();
5247 if (new_opt == NULL)
5248 return NULL;
5249
5250 destroy_vector(new_opt->cell_properties);
5251 new_opt->cell_properties = copy_cell_properties(properties->cell_properties);
5252 if (new_opt->cell_properties == NULL) {
5253 destroy_table_properties(new_opt);
5254 return NULL;
5255 }
5256
5257 memcpy(&new_opt->border_style, &properties->border_style, sizeof(struct fort_border_style));
5258 memcpy(&new_opt->entire_table_properties,
5259 &properties->entire_table_properties, sizeof(fort_entire_table_properties_t));
5260
5261 return new_opt;
5262}
5263
5264/********************************************************
5265 End of file "properties.c"
5266 ********************************************************/
5267
5268
5269/********************************************************
5270 Begin of file "row.c"
5271 ********************************************************/
5272
5273#include <assert.h>
5274#include <ctype.h>
5275/* #include "row.h" */ /* Commented by amalgamation script */
5276/* #include "cell.h" */ /* Commented by amalgamation script */
5277/* #include "string_buffer.h" */ /* Commented by amalgamation script */
5278/* #include "vector.h" */ /* Commented by amalgamation script */
5279
5280
5281struct f_row {
5282 f_vector_t *cells;
5283};
5284
5285static
5286f_row_t *create_row_impl(f_vector_t *cells)
5287{
5288 f_row_t *row = (f_row_t *)F_CALLOC(1, sizeof(f_row_t));
5289 if (row == NULL)
5290 return NULL;
5291 if (cells) {
5292 row->cells = cells;
5293 } else {
5294 row->cells = create_vector(sizeof(f_cell_t *), DEFAULT_VECTOR_CAPACITY);
5295 if (row->cells == NULL) {
5296 F_FREE(row);
5297 return NULL;
5298 }
5299 }
5300 return row;
5301}
5302
5303FT_INTERNAL
5304f_row_t *create_row(void)
5305{
5306 return create_row_impl(NULL);
5307}
5308
5309static
5310void destroy_each_cell(f_vector_t *cells)
5311{
5312 size_t i = 0;
5313 size_t cells_n = vector_size(cells);
5314 for (i = 0; i < cells_n; ++i) {
5315 f_cell_t *cell = VECTOR_AT(cells, i, f_cell_t *);
5316 destroy_cell(cell);
5317 }
5318}
5319
5320FT_INTERNAL
5321void destroy_row(f_row_t *row)
5322{
5323 if (row == NULL)
5324 return;
5325
5326 if (row->cells) {
5327 destroy_each_cell(row->cells);
5328 destroy_vector(row->cells);
5329 }
5330
5331 F_FREE(row);
5332}
5333
5334FT_INTERNAL
5335f_row_t *copy_row(f_row_t *row)
5336{
5337 assert(row);
5338 f_row_t *result = create_row();
5339 if (result == NULL)
5340 return NULL;
5341
5342 size_t i = 0;
5343 size_t cols_n = vector_size(row->cells);
5344 for (i = 0; i < cols_n; ++i) {
5345 f_cell_t *cell = VECTOR_AT(row->cells, i, f_cell_t *);
5346 f_cell_t *new_cell = copy_cell(cell);
5347 if (new_cell == NULL) {
5348 destroy_row(result);
5349 return NULL;
5350 }
5351 vector_push(result->cells, &new_cell);
5352 }
5353
5354 return result;
5355}
5356
5357FT_INTERNAL
5358f_row_t *split_row(f_row_t *row, size_t pos)
5359{
5360 assert(row);
5361
5362 f_vector_t *cells = vector_split(row->cells, pos);
5363 if (!cells)
5364 return NULL;
5365 f_row_t *tail = create_row_impl(cells);
5366 if (!tail) {
5367 destroy_each_cell(cells);
5368 destroy_vector(cells);
5369 }
5370 return tail;
5371}
5372
5373FT_INTERNAL
5374int ft_row_erase_range(f_row_t *row, size_t left, size_t right)
5375{
5376 assert(row);
5377 size_t cols_n = vector_size(row->cells);
5378 if (cols_n == 0 || (right < left))
5379 return FT_SUCCESS;
5380
5381 f_cell_t *cell = NULL;
5382 size_t i = left;
5383 while (i < cols_n && i <= right) {
5384 cell = VECTOR_AT(row->cells, i, f_cell_t *);
5385 destroy_cell(cell);
5386 ++i;
5387 }
5388 size_t n_destroy = MIN(cols_n - 1, right) - left + 1;
5389 while (n_destroy--) {
5390 vector_erase(row->cells, left);
5391 }
5392 return FT_SUCCESS;
5393}
5394
5395FT_INTERNAL
5396size_t columns_in_row(const f_row_t *row)
5397{
5398 if (row == NULL || row->cells == NULL)
5399 return 0;
5400
5401 return vector_size(row->cells);
5402}
5403
5404
5405static
5406f_cell_t *get_cell_impl(f_row_t *row, size_t col, enum f_get_policy policy)
5407{
5408 if (row == NULL || row->cells == NULL) {
5409 return NULL;
5410 }
5411
5412 switch (policy) {
5413 case DONT_CREATE_ON_NULL:
5414 if (col < columns_in_row(row)) {
5415 return VECTOR_AT(row->cells, col, f_cell_t *);
5416 }
5417 return NULL;
5418 case CREATE_ON_NULL:
5419 while (col >= columns_in_row(row)) {
5420 f_cell_t *new_cell = create_cell();
5421 if (new_cell == NULL)
5422 return NULL;
5423 if (FT_IS_ERROR(vector_push(row->cells, &new_cell))) {
5424 destroy_cell(new_cell);
5425 return NULL;
5426 }
5427 }
5428 return VECTOR_AT(row->cells, col, f_cell_t *);
5429 }
5430
5431 assert(0 && "Shouldn't be here!");
5432 return NULL;
5433}
5434
5435
5436FT_INTERNAL
5437f_cell_t *get_cell(f_row_t *row, size_t col)
5438{
5439 return get_cell_impl(row, col, DONT_CREATE_ON_NULL);
5440}
5441
5442
5443FT_INTERNAL
5444const f_cell_t *get_cell_c(const f_row_t *row, size_t col)
5445{
5446 return get_cell((f_row_t *)row, col);
5447}
5448
5449
5450FT_INTERNAL
5451f_cell_t *get_cell_and_create_if_not_exists(f_row_t *row, size_t col)
5452{
5453 return get_cell_impl(row, col, CREATE_ON_NULL);
5454}
5455
5456FT_INTERNAL
5457f_cell_t *create_cell_in_position(f_row_t *row, size_t col)
5458{
5459 if (row == NULL || row->cells == NULL) {
5460 return NULL;
5461 }
5462
5463 f_cell_t *new_cell = create_cell();
5464 if (new_cell == NULL)
5465 return NULL;
5466 if (FT_IS_ERROR(vector_insert(row->cells, &new_cell, col))) {
5467 destroy_cell(new_cell);
5468 return NULL;
5469 }
5470 return VECTOR_AT(row->cells, col, f_cell_t *);
5471}
5472
5473
5474FT_INTERNAL
5475f_status swap_row(f_row_t *cur_row, f_row_t *ins_row, size_t pos)
5476{
5477 assert(cur_row);
5478 assert(ins_row);
5479 size_t cur_sz = vector_size(cur_row->cells);
5480 if (cur_sz == 0 && pos == 0) {
5481 f_row_t tmp;
5482 memcpy(&tmp, cur_row, sizeof(f_row_t));
5483 memcpy(cur_row, ins_row, sizeof(f_row_t));
5484 memcpy(ins_row, &tmp, sizeof(f_row_t));
5485 return FT_SUCCESS;
5486 }
5487
5488 return vector_swap(cur_row->cells, ins_row->cells, pos);
5489}
5490
5491/* Ownership of cells of `ins_row` is passed to `cur_row`. */
5492FT_INTERNAL
5493f_status insert_row(f_row_t *cur_row, f_row_t *ins_row, size_t pos)
5494{
5495 assert(cur_row);
5496 assert(ins_row);
5497
5498 while (vector_size(cur_row->cells) < pos) {
5499 f_cell_t *new_cell = create_cell();
5500 if (!new_cell)
5501 return FT_GEN_ERROR;
5502 vector_push(cur_row->cells, &new_cell);
5503 }
5504
5505 size_t sz = vector_size(ins_row->cells);
5506 size_t i = 0;
5507 for (i = 0; i < sz; ++i) {
5508 f_cell_t *cell = VECTOR_AT(ins_row->cells, i, f_cell_t *);
5509 if (FT_IS_ERROR(vector_insert(cur_row->cells, &cell, pos + i))) {
5510 /* clean up what we have inserted */
5511 while (i--) {
5512 vector_erase(cur_row->cells, pos);
5513 }
5514 return FT_GEN_ERROR;
5515 }
5516 }
5517 /* Clear cells so that it will be safe to destroy this row */
5518 vector_clear(ins_row->cells);
5519 return FT_SUCCESS;
5520}
5521
5522
5523FT_INTERNAL
5524size_t group_cell_number(const f_row_t *row, size_t master_cell_col)
5525{
5526 assert(row);
5527 const f_cell_t *master_cell = get_cell_c(row, master_cell_col);
5528 if (master_cell == NULL)
5529 return 0;
5530
5531 if (get_cell_type(master_cell) != GROUP_MASTER_CELL)
5532 return 1;
5533
5534 size_t total_cols = vector_size(row->cells);
5535 size_t slave_col = master_cell_col + 1;
5536 while (slave_col < total_cols) {
5537 const f_cell_t *cell = get_cell_c(row, slave_col);
5538 if (cell && get_cell_type(cell) == GROUP_SLAVE_CELL) {
5539 ++slave_col;
5540 } else {
5541 break;
5542 }
5543 }
5544 return slave_col - master_cell_col;
5545}
5546
5547
5548FT_INTERNAL
5549int get_row_cell_types(const f_row_t *row, enum f_cell_type *types, size_t types_sz)
5550{
5551 assert(row);
5552 assert(types);
5553 size_t i = 0;
5554 for (i = 0; i < types_sz; ++i) {
5555 const f_cell_t *cell = get_cell_c(row, i);
5556 if (cell) {
5557 types[i] = get_cell_type(cell);
5558 } else {
5559 types[i] = COMMON_CELL;
5560 }
5561 }
5562 return FT_SUCCESS;
5563}
5564
5565
5566FT_INTERNAL
5567f_status row_set_cell_span(f_row_t *row, size_t cell_column, size_t hor_span)
5568{
5569 assert(row);
5570
5571 if (hor_span < 2)
5572 return FT_EINVAL;
5573
5574 f_cell_t *main_cell = get_cell_and_create_if_not_exists(row, cell_column);
5575 if (main_cell == NULL) {
5576 return FT_GEN_ERROR;
5577 }
5578 set_cell_type(main_cell, GROUP_MASTER_CELL);
5579 --hor_span;
5580 ++cell_column;
5581
5582 while (hor_span) {
5583 f_cell_t *slave_cell = get_cell_and_create_if_not_exists(row, cell_column);
5584 if (slave_cell == NULL) {
5585 return FT_GEN_ERROR;
5586 }
5587 set_cell_type(slave_cell, GROUP_SLAVE_CELL);
5588 --hor_span;
5589 ++cell_column;
5590 }
5591
5592 return FT_SUCCESS;
5593}
5594
5595static
5596int print_row_separator_impl(f_conv_context_t *cntx,
5597 const size_t *col_width_arr, size_t cols,
5598 const f_row_t *upper_row, const f_row_t *lower_row,
5599 enum f_hor_separator_pos separatorPos,
5600 const f_separator_t *sep)
5601{
5602 assert(cntx);
5603
5604 int status = FT_GEN_ERROR;
5605
5606 const f_context_t *context = cntx->cntx;
5607
5608 /* Get cell types
5609 *
5610 * Regions above top row and below bottom row areconsidered full of virtual
5611 * GROUP_SLAVE_CELL cells
5612 */
5613 enum f_cell_type *top_row_types = (enum f_cell_type *)F_MALLOC(sizeof(enum f_cell_type) * cols * 2);
5614 if (top_row_types == NULL) {
5615 return FT_MEMORY_ERROR;
5616 }
5617 enum f_cell_type *bottom_row_types = top_row_types + cols;
5618 if (upper_row) {
5619 get_row_cell_types(upper_row, top_row_types, cols);
5620 } else {
5621 size_t i = 0;
5622 for (i = 0; i < cols; ++i)
5623 top_row_types[i] = GROUP_SLAVE_CELL;
5624 }
5625 if (lower_row) {
5626 get_row_cell_types(lower_row, bottom_row_types, cols);
5627 } else {
5628 size_t i = 0;
5629 for (i = 0; i < cols; ++i)
5630 bottom_row_types[i] = GROUP_SLAVE_CELL;
5631 }
5632
5633
5634 f_table_properties_t *properties = context->table_properties;
5635 fort_entire_table_properties_t *entire_tprops = &properties->entire_table_properties;
5636
5637 size_t written = 0;
5638 int tmp = 0;
5639
5640 enum ft_row_type lower_row_type = FT_ROW_COMMON;
5641 if (lower_row != NULL) {
5642 lower_row_type = (enum ft_row_type)get_cell_property_hierarchically(properties, context->row, FT_ANY_COLUMN, FT_CPROP_ROW_TYPE);
5643 }
5644 enum ft_row_type upper_row_type = FT_ROW_COMMON;
5645 if (upper_row != NULL) {
5646 upper_row_type = (enum ft_row_type)get_cell_property_hierarchically(properties, context->row - 1, FT_ANY_COLUMN, FT_CPROP_ROW_TYPE);
5647 }
5648
5649 /* Row separator anatomy
5650 *
5651 * | C11 | C12 C13 | C14 C15 |
5652 * L I I I IV I I IT I I I IB I I II I I R
5653 * | C21 | C22 | C23 C24 C25 |
5654 */
5655 const char **L = NULL;
5656 const char **I = NULL;
5657 const char **IV = NULL;
5658 const char **R = NULL;
5659 const char **IT = NULL;
5660 const char **IB = NULL;
5661 const char **II = NULL;
5662
5663 struct fort_border_style *border_style = &properties->border_style;
5664
5665 typedef const char *(*border_chars_point_t)[BORDER_ITEM_POS_SIZE];
5666 const char *(*border_chars)[BORDER_ITEM_POS_SIZE] = NULL;
5667 border_chars = (border_chars_point_t)&border_style->border_chars;
5668 if (upper_row_type == FT_ROW_HEADER || lower_row_type == FT_ROW_HEADER) {
5669 border_chars = (border_chars_point_t)&border_style->header_border_chars;
5670 }
5671
5672 if (sep && sep->enabled) {
5673 L = &(border_style->separator_chars[LH_sip]);
5674 I = &(border_style->separator_chars[IH_sip]);
5675 IV = &(border_style->separator_chars[II_sip]);
5676 R = &(border_style->separator_chars[RH_sip]);
5677
5678 IT = &(border_style->separator_chars[TI_sip]);
5679 IB = &(border_style->separator_chars[BI_sip]);
5680 II = &(border_style->separator_chars[IH_sip]);
5681
5682 if (lower_row == NULL) {
5683 L = &(*border_chars)[BL_bip];
5684 R = &(*border_chars)[BR_bip];
5685 } else if (upper_row == NULL) {
5686 L = &(*border_chars)[TL_bip];
5687 R = &(*border_chars)[TR_bip];
5688 }
5689 } else {
5690 switch (separatorPos) {
5691 case TOP_SEPARATOR:
5692 L = &(*border_chars)[TL_bip];
5693 I = &(*border_chars)[TT_bip];
5694 IV = &(*border_chars)[TV_bip];
5695 R = &(*border_chars)[TR_bip];
5696
5697 IT = &(*border_chars)[TV_bip];
5698 IB = &(*border_chars)[TV_bip];
5699 II = &(*border_chars)[TT_bip];
5700 break;
5701 case INSIDE_SEPARATOR:
5702 L = &(*border_chars)[LH_bip];
5703 I = &(*border_chars)[IH_bip];
5704 IV = &(*border_chars)[II_bip];
5705 R = &(*border_chars)[RH_bip];
5706
5707 IT = &(*border_chars)[TI_bip];
5708 IB = &(*border_chars)[BI_bip];
5709 II = &(*border_chars)[IH_bip];
5710 break;
5711 case BOTTOM_SEPARATOR:
5712 L = &(*border_chars)[BL_bip];
5713 I = &(*border_chars)[BB_bip];
5714 IV = &(*border_chars)[BV_bip];
5715 R = &(*border_chars)[BR_bip];
5716
5717 IT = &(*border_chars)[BV_bip];
5718 IB = &(*border_chars)[BV_bip];
5719 II = &(*border_chars)[BB_bip];
5720 break;
5721 default:
5722 break;
5723 }
5724 }
5725
5726 size_t i = 0;
5727
5728 /* If all chars are not printable, skip line separator */
5729 /* NOTE: argument of `isprint` should be explicitly converted to
5730 * unsigned char according to
5731 * https://en.cppreference.com/w/c/string/byte/isprint
5732 */
5733 if ((strlen(*L) == 0 || (strlen(*L) == 1 && !isprint((unsigned char) **L)))
5734 && (strlen(*I) == 0 || (strlen(*I) == 1 && !isprint((unsigned char) **I)))
5735 && (strlen(*IV) == 0 || (strlen(*IV) == 1 && !isprint((unsigned char) **IV)))
5736 && (strlen(*R) == 0 || (strlen(*R) == 1 && !isprint((unsigned char) **R)))) {
5737 status = 0;
5738 goto clear;
5739 }
5740
5741 /* Print left margin */
5742 CHCK_RSLT_ADD_TO_WRITTEN(print_n_strings(cntx, entire_tprops->left_margin, FT_SPACE));
5743
5744 for (i = 0; i < cols; ++i) {
5745 if (i == 0) {
5746 CHCK_RSLT_ADD_TO_WRITTEN(print_n_strings(cntx, 1, *L));
5747 } else {
5748 if ((top_row_types[i] == COMMON_CELL || top_row_types[i] == GROUP_MASTER_CELL)
5749 && (bottom_row_types[i] == COMMON_CELL || bottom_row_types[i] == GROUP_MASTER_CELL)) {
5750 CHCK_RSLT_ADD_TO_WRITTEN(print_n_strings(cntx, 1, *IV));
5751 } else if (top_row_types[i] == GROUP_SLAVE_CELL && bottom_row_types[i] == GROUP_SLAVE_CELL) {
5752 CHCK_RSLT_ADD_TO_WRITTEN(print_n_strings(cntx, 1, *II));
5753 } else if (top_row_types[i] == GROUP_SLAVE_CELL) {
5754 CHCK_RSLT_ADD_TO_WRITTEN(print_n_strings(cntx, 1, *IT));
5755 } else {
5756 CHCK_RSLT_ADD_TO_WRITTEN(print_n_strings(cntx, 1, *IB));
5757 }
5758 }
5759 CHCK_RSLT_ADD_TO_WRITTEN(print_n_strings(cntx, col_width_arr[i], *I));
5760 }
5761 CHCK_RSLT_ADD_TO_WRITTEN(print_n_strings(cntx, 1, *R));
5762
5763 /* Print right margin */
5764 CHCK_RSLT_ADD_TO_WRITTEN(print_n_strings(cntx, entire_tprops->right_margin, FT_SPACE));
5765
5766 CHCK_RSLT_ADD_TO_WRITTEN(print_n_strings(cntx, 1, FT_NEWLINE));
5767
5768 status = (int)written;
5769
5770clear:
5771 F_FREE(top_row_types);
5772 return status;
5773}
5774
5775FT_INTERNAL
5776int print_row_separator(f_conv_context_t *cntx,
5777 const size_t *col_width_arr, size_t cols,
5778 const f_row_t *upper_row, const f_row_t *lower_row,
5779 enum f_hor_separator_pos separatorPos, const f_separator_t *sep)
5780{
5781 return print_row_separator_impl(cntx, col_width_arr, cols, upper_row, lower_row,
5782 separatorPos, sep);
5783}
5784
5785FT_INTERNAL
5786f_row_t *create_row_from_string(const char *str)
5787{
5788 typedef char char_type;
5789 char_type *(*strdup_)(const char_type * str) = F_STRDUP;
5790 const char_type zero_char = '\0';
5791 f_status(*fill_cell_from_string_)(f_cell_t *cell, const char *str) = fill_cell_from_string;
5792 const char_type *const zero_string = "";
5793#define STRCHR strchr
5794
5795 char_type *pos = NULL;
5796 char_type *base_pos = NULL;
5797 size_t number_of_separators = 0;
5798
5799 f_row_t *row = create_row();
5800 if (row == NULL)
5801 return NULL;
5802
5803 if (str == NULL)
5804 return row;
5805
5806 char_type *str_copy = strdup_(str);
5807 if (str_copy == NULL)
5808 goto clear;
5809
5810 pos = str_copy;
5811 base_pos = str_copy;
5812 number_of_separators = 0;
5813 while (*pos) {
5814 pos = STRCHR(pos, g_col_separator);
5815 if (pos != NULL) {
5816 *(pos) = zero_char;
5817 ++pos;
5818 number_of_separators++;
5819 }
5820
5821 f_cell_t *cell = create_cell();
5822 if (cell == NULL)
5823 goto clear;
5824
5825 int status = fill_cell_from_string_(cell, base_pos);
5826 if (FT_IS_ERROR(status)) {
5827 destroy_cell(cell);
5828 goto clear;
5829 }
5830
5831 status = vector_push(row->cells, &cell);
5832 if (FT_IS_ERROR(status)) {
5833 destroy_cell(cell);
5834 goto clear;
5835 }
5836
5837 if (pos == NULL)
5838 break;
5839 base_pos = pos;
5840 }
5841
5842 /* special case if in format string last cell is empty */
5843 while (vector_size(row->cells) < (number_of_separators + 1)) {
5844 f_cell_t *cell = create_cell();
5845 if (cell == NULL)
5846 goto clear;
5847
5848 int status = fill_cell_from_string_(cell, zero_string);
5849 if (FT_IS_ERROR(status)) {
5850 destroy_cell(cell);
5851 goto clear;
5852 }
5853
5854 status = vector_push(row->cells, &cell);
5855 if (FT_IS_ERROR(status)) {
5856 destroy_cell(cell);
5857 goto clear;
5858 }
5859 }
5860
5861 F_FREE(str_copy);
5862 return row;
5863
5864clear:
5865 destroy_row(row);
5866 F_FREE(str_copy);
5867 return NULL;
5868
5869#undef STRCHR
5870}
5871
5872
5873#ifdef FT_HAVE_WCHAR
5874FT_INTERNAL
5875f_row_t *create_row_from_wstring(const wchar_t *str)
5876{
5877 typedef wchar_t char_type;
5878 char_type *(*strdup_)(const char_type * str) = F_WCSDUP;
5879 const char_type zero_char = L'\0';
5880 f_status(*fill_cell_from_string_)(f_cell_t *cell, const wchar_t *str) = fill_cell_from_wstring;
5881 const char_type *const zero_string = L"";
5882#define STRCHR wcschr
5883
5884 char_type *pos = NULL;
5885 char_type *base_pos = NULL;
5886 size_t number_of_separators = 0;
5887
5888 f_row_t *row = create_row();
5889 if (row == NULL)
5890 return NULL;
5891
5892 if (str == NULL)
5893 return row;
5894
5895 char_type *str_copy = strdup_(str);
5896 if (str_copy == NULL)
5897 goto clear;
5898
5899 pos = str_copy;
5900 base_pos = str_copy;
5901 number_of_separators = 0;
5902 while (*pos) {
5903 pos = STRCHR(pos, g_col_separator);
5904 if (pos != NULL) {
5905 *(pos) = zero_char;
5906 ++pos;
5907 number_of_separators++;
5908 }
5909
5910 f_cell_t *cell = create_cell();
5911 if (cell == NULL)
5912 goto clear;
5913
5914 int status = fill_cell_from_string_(cell, base_pos);
5915 if (FT_IS_ERROR(status)) {
5916 destroy_cell(cell);
5917 goto clear;
5918 }
5919
5920 status = vector_push(row->cells, &cell);
5921 if (FT_IS_ERROR(status)) {
5922 destroy_cell(cell);
5923 goto clear;
5924 }
5925
5926 if (pos == NULL)
5927 break;
5928 base_pos = pos;
5929 }
5930
5931 /* special case if in format string last cell is empty */
5932 while (vector_size(row->cells) < (number_of_separators + 1)) {
5933 f_cell_t *cell = create_cell();
5934 if (cell == NULL)
5935 goto clear;
5936
5937 int status = fill_cell_from_string_(cell, zero_string);
5938 if (FT_IS_ERROR(status)) {
5939 destroy_cell(cell);
5940 goto clear;
5941 }
5942
5943 status = vector_push(row->cells, &cell);
5944 if (FT_IS_ERROR(status)) {
5945 destroy_cell(cell);
5946 goto clear;
5947 }
5948 }
5949
5950 F_FREE(str_copy);
5951 return row;
5952
5953clear:
5954 destroy_row(row);
5955 F_FREE(str_copy);
5956 return NULL;
5957#undef STRCHR
5958}
5959#endif
5960
5961FT_INTERNAL
5962f_row_t *create_row_from_buffer(const f_string_buffer_t *buffer)
5963{
5964 switch (buffer->type) {
5965 case CHAR_BUF:
5966 return create_row_from_string(buffer->str.cstr);
5967#ifdef FT_HAVE_WCHAR
5968 case W_CHAR_BUF:
5969 return create_row_from_wstring(buffer->str.wstr);
5970#endif /* FT_HAVE_WCHAR */
5971#ifdef FT_HAVE_UTF8
5972 case UTF8_BUF:
5973 return create_row_from_string((const char *)buffer->str.u8str);
5974#endif /* FT_HAVE_UTF8 */
5975 default:
5976 assert(0);
5977 return NULL;
5978 }
5979}
5980
5981static int
5982vsnprintf_buffer(f_string_buffer_t *buffer, const struct f_string_view *fmt,
5983 va_list *va)
5984{
5985 /* Disable compiler diagnostic (format string is not a string literal) */
5986#if defined(FT_CLANG_COMPILER)
5987#pragma clang diagnostic push
5988#pragma clang diagnostic ignored "-Wformat-nonliteral"
5989#endif
5990#if defined(FT_GCC_COMPILER)
5991#pragma GCC diagnostic push
5992#pragma GCC diagnostic ignored "-Wformat-nonliteral"
5993#endif
5994 size_t width_capacity = string_buffer_width_capacity(buffer);
5995 switch (buffer->type) {
5996 case CHAR_BUF:
5997 return vsnprintf(buffer->str.cstr, width_capacity, fmt->u.cstr, *va);
5998#ifdef FT_HAVE_WCHAR
5999 case W_CHAR_BUF:
6000 return vswprintf(buffer->str.wstr, width_capacity, fmt->u.wstr, *va);
6001#endif
6002#ifdef FT_HAVE_UTF8
6003 case UTF8_BUF:
6004 return vsnprintf(buffer->str.cstr, width_capacity, fmt->u.cstr, *va);
6005#endif
6006 default:
6007 assert(0);
6008 return 0;
6009 }
6010#if defined(FT_CLANG_COMPILER)
6011#pragma clang diagnostic pop
6012#endif
6013#if defined(FT_GCC_COMPILER)
6014#pragma GCC diagnostic pop
6015#endif
6016}
6017
6018FT_INTERNAL
6019f_row_t *create_row_from_fmt_string(const struct f_string_view *fmt, va_list *va_args)
6020{
6021 f_string_buffer_t *buffer = create_string_buffer(DEFAULT_STR_BUF_SIZE, fmt->type);
6022 if (buffer == NULL)
6023 return NULL;
6024
6025 size_t cols_origin = number_of_columns_in_format_string(fmt);
6026 size_t cols = 0;
6027
6028 while (1) {
6029 va_list va;
6030 va_copy(va, *va_args);
6031 int virtual_sz = vsnprintf_buffer(buffer, fmt, &va);
6032 va_end(va);
6033 /* If error encountered */
6034 if (virtual_sz < 0)
6035 goto clear;
6036
6037 /* Successful write */
6038 if ((size_t)virtual_sz < string_buffer_width_capacity(buffer))
6039 break;
6040
6041 /* Otherwise buffer was too small, so incr. buffer size ant try again. */
6042 if (!FT_IS_SUCCESS(realloc_string_buffer_without_copy(buffer)))
6043 goto clear;
6044 }
6045
6046 cols = number_of_columns_in_format_buffer(buffer);
6047 if (cols == cols_origin) {
6048 f_row_t *row = create_row_from_buffer(buffer);
6049 if (row == NULL) {
6050 goto clear;
6051 }
6052
6053 destroy_string_buffer(buffer);
6054 return row;
6055 }
6056
6057 if (cols_origin == 1) {
6058 f_row_t *row = create_row();
6059 if (row == NULL) {
6060 goto clear;
6061 }
6062
6063 f_cell_t *cell = get_cell_and_create_if_not_exists(row, 0);
6064 if (cell == NULL) {
6065 destroy_row(row);
6066 goto clear;
6067 }
6068
6069 f_status result = fill_cell_from_buffer(cell, buffer);
6070 if (FT_IS_ERROR(result)) {
6071 destroy_row(row);
6072 goto clear;
6073 }
6074
6075 destroy_string_buffer(buffer);
6076 return row;
6077 }
6078
6079 /*
6080 * todo: add processing of cols != cols_origin in a general way
6081 * (when cols_origin != 1).
6082 */
6083
6084clear:
6085 destroy_string_buffer(buffer);
6086 return NULL;
6087}
6088
6089
6090FT_INTERNAL
6091int snprintf_row(const f_row_t *row, f_conv_context_t *cntx, size_t *col_width_arr, size_t col_width_arr_sz,
6092 size_t row_height)
6093{
6094 const f_context_t *context = cntx->cntx;
6095 assert(context);
6096
6097 if (row == NULL)
6098 return -1;
6099
6100 size_t cols_in_row = columns_in_row(row);
6101 if (cols_in_row > col_width_arr_sz)
6102 return -1;
6103
6104 /* Row separator anatomy
6105 *
6106 * L data IV data IV data R
6107 */
6108 f_table_properties_t *properties = context->table_properties;
6109
6110 typedef const char *(*border_chars_point_t)[BORDER_ITEM_POS_SIZE];
6111 enum ft_row_type row_type = (enum ft_row_type)get_cell_property_hierarchically(properties, context->row, FT_ANY_COLUMN, FT_CPROP_ROW_TYPE);
6112 const char *(*bord_chars)[BORDER_ITEM_POS_SIZE] = (row_type == FT_ROW_HEADER)
6113 ? (border_chars_point_t)(&properties->border_style.header_border_chars)
6114 : (border_chars_point_t)(&properties->border_style.border_chars);
6115 const char **L = &(*bord_chars)[LL_bip];
6116 const char **IV = &(*bord_chars)[IV_bip];
6117 const char **R = &(*bord_chars)[RR_bip];
6118
6119
6120 size_t written = 0;
6121 int tmp = 0;
6122 size_t i = 0;
6123 fort_entire_table_properties_t *entire_tprops = &context->table_properties->entire_table_properties;
6124 for (i = 0; i < row_height; ++i) {
6125 /* Print left margin */
6126 CHCK_RSLT_ADD_TO_WRITTEN(print_n_strings(cntx, entire_tprops->left_margin, FT_SPACE));
6127
6128 /* Print left table boundary */
6129 CHCK_RSLT_ADD_TO_WRITTEN(print_n_strings(cntx, 1, *L));
6130 size_t j = 0;
6131 while (j < col_width_arr_sz) {
6132 if (j < cols_in_row) {
6133 ((f_context_t *)context)->column = j;
6134 f_cell_t *cell = VECTOR_AT(row->cells, j, f_cell_t *);
6135 size_t cell_vis_width = 0;
6136
6137 size_t group_slave_sz = group_cell_number(row, j);
6138 cell_vis_width = col_width_arr[j];
6139 size_t slave_j = 0;
6140 size_t master_j = j;
6141 for (slave_j = master_j + 1; slave_j < (master_j + group_slave_sz); ++slave_j) {
6142 cell_vis_width += col_width_arr[slave_j] + FORT_COL_SEPARATOR_LENGTH;
6143 ++j;
6144 }
6145
6146 CHCK_RSLT_ADD_TO_WRITTEN(cell_printf(cell, i, cntx, cell_vis_width));
6147 } else {
6148 /* Print empty cell */
6149 CHCK_RSLT_ADD_TO_WRITTEN(print_n_strings(cntx, col_width_arr[j], FT_SPACE));
6150 }
6151
6152 /* Print boundary between cells */
6153 if (j < col_width_arr_sz - 1)
6154 CHCK_RSLT_ADD_TO_WRITTEN(print_n_strings(cntx, 1, *IV));
6155
6156 ++j;
6157 }
6158
6159 /* Print right table boundary */
6160 CHCK_RSLT_ADD_TO_WRITTEN(print_n_strings(cntx, 1, *R));
6161
6162 /* Print right margin */
6163 CHCK_RSLT_ADD_TO_WRITTEN(print_n_strings(cntx, entire_tprops->right_margin, FT_SPACE));
6164
6165 /* Print new line character */
6166 CHCK_RSLT_ADD_TO_WRITTEN(print_n_strings(cntx, 1, FT_NEWLINE));
6167 }
6168 return (int)written;
6169
6170clear:
6171 return -1;
6172}
6173
6174/********************************************************
6175 End of file "row.c"
6176 ********************************************************/
6177
6178
6179/********************************************************
6180 Begin of file "string_buffer.c"
6181 ********************************************************/
6182
6183/* #include "string_buffer.h" */ /* Commented by amalgamation script */
6184/* #include "properties.h" */ /* Commented by amalgamation script */
6185/* #include "wcwidth.h" */ /* Commented by amalgamation script */
6186#include <assert.h>
6187#include <stddef.h>
6188#ifdef FT_HAVE_WCHAR
6189#include <wchar.h>
6190#endif
6191#if defined(FT_HAVE_UTF8)
6192/* #include "utf8.h" */ /* Commented by amalgamation script */
6193#endif
6194
6195static ptrdiff_t str_iter_width(const char *beg, const char *end)
6196{
6197 assert(end >= beg);
6198 return (end - beg);
6199}
6200
6201
6202#ifdef FT_HAVE_WCHAR
6203static ptrdiff_t wcs_iter_width(const wchar_t *beg, const wchar_t *end)
6204{
6205 assert(end >= beg);
6206 return mk_wcswidth(beg, (size_t)(end - beg));
6207}
6208#endif /* FT_HAVE_WCHAR */
6209
6210
6211static size_t buf_str_len(const f_string_buffer_t *buf)
6212{
6213 assert(buf);
6214
6215 switch (buf->type) {
6216 case CHAR_BUF:
6217 return strlen(buf->str.cstr);
6218#ifdef FT_HAVE_WCHAR
6219 case W_CHAR_BUF:
6220 return wcslen(buf->str.wstr);
6221#endif
6222#ifdef FT_HAVE_UTF8
6223 case UTF8_BUF:
6224 return utf8len(buf->str.u8str);
6225#endif
6226 }
6227
6228 assert(0);
6229 return 0;
6230}
6231
6232
6233FT_INTERNAL
6234size_t strchr_count(const char *str, char ch)
6235{
6236 if (str == NULL)
6237 return 0;
6238
6239 size_t count = 0;
6240 str = strchr(str, ch);
6241 while (str) {
6242 count++;
6243 str++;
6244 str = strchr(str, ch);
6245 }
6246 return count;
6247}
6248
6249#ifdef FT_HAVE_WCHAR
6250FT_INTERNAL
6251size_t wstrchr_count(const wchar_t *str, wchar_t ch)
6252{
6253 if (str == NULL)
6254 return 0;
6255
6256 size_t count = 0;
6257 str = wcschr(str, ch);
6258 while (str) {
6259 count++;
6260 str++;
6261 str = wcschr(str, ch);
6262 }
6263 return count;
6264}
6265#endif
6266
6267
6268#if defined(FT_HAVE_UTF8)
6269/* todo: do something with code below!!! */
6270FT_INTERNAL
6271void *ut8next(const void *str)
6272{
6273 utf8_int32_t out_codepoint;
6274 return utf8codepoint(str, &out_codepoint);
6275}
6276
6277FT_INTERNAL
6278size_t utf8chr_count(const void *str, utf8_int32_t ch)
6279{
6280 if (str == NULL)
6281 return 0;
6282
6283 size_t count = 0;
6284 str = utf8chr(str, ch);
6285 while (str) {
6286 count++;
6287 str = ut8next(str);
6288 str = utf8chr(str, ch);
6289 }
6290 return count;
6291}
6292#endif /* FT_HAVE_UTF8 */
6293
6294
6295FT_INTERNAL
6296const char *str_n_substring_beg(const char *str, char ch_separator, size_t n)
6297{
6298 if (str == NULL)
6299 return NULL;
6300
6301 if (n == 0)
6302 return str;
6303
6304 str = strchr(str, ch_separator);
6305 --n;
6306 while (n > 0) {
6307 if (str == NULL)
6308 return NULL;
6309 --n;
6310 str++;
6311 str = strchr(str, ch_separator);
6312 }
6313 return str ? (str + 1) : NULL;
6314}
6315
6316
6317#ifdef FT_HAVE_WCHAR
6318FT_INTERNAL
6319const wchar_t *wstr_n_substring_beg(const wchar_t *str, wchar_t ch_separator, size_t n)
6320{
6321 if (str == NULL)
6322 return NULL;
6323
6324 if (n == 0)
6325 return str;
6326
6327 str = wcschr(str, ch_separator);
6328 --n;
6329 while (n > 0) {
6330 if (str == NULL)
6331 return NULL;
6332 --n;
6333 str++;
6334 str = wcschr(str, ch_separator);
6335 }
6336 return str ? (str + 1) : NULL;
6337}
6338#endif /* FT_HAVE_WCHAR */
6339
6340#if defined(FT_HAVE_UTF8)
6341FT_INTERNAL
6342const void *utf8_n_substring_beg(const void *str, utf8_int32_t ch_separator, size_t n)
6343{
6344 if (str == NULL)
6345 return NULL;
6346
6347 if (n == 0)
6348 return str;
6349
6350 str = utf8chr(str, ch_separator);
6351 --n;
6352 while (n > 0) {
6353 if (str == NULL)
6354 return NULL;
6355 --n;
6356 str = ut8next(str);
6357 str = utf8chr(str, ch_separator);
6358 }
6359 return str ? (ut8next(str)) : NULL;
6360}
6361#endif
6362
6363
6364FT_INTERNAL
6365void str_n_substring(const char *str, char ch_separator, size_t n, const char **begin, const char **end)
6366{
6367 const char *beg = str_n_substring_beg(str, ch_separator, n);
6368 if (beg == NULL) {
6369 *begin = NULL;
6370 *end = NULL;
6371 return;
6372 }
6373
6374 const char *en = strchr(beg, ch_separator);
6375 if (en == NULL) {
6376 en = str + strlen(str);
6377 }
6378
6379 *begin = beg;
6380 *end = en;
6381 return;
6382}
6383
6384
6385#ifdef FT_HAVE_WCHAR
6386FT_INTERNAL
6387void wstr_n_substring(const wchar_t *str, wchar_t ch_separator, size_t n, const wchar_t **begin, const wchar_t **end)
6388{
6389 const wchar_t *beg = wstr_n_substring_beg(str, ch_separator, n);
6390 if (beg == NULL) {
6391 *begin = NULL;
6392 *end = NULL;
6393 return;
6394 }
6395
6396 const wchar_t *en = wcschr(beg, ch_separator);
6397 if (en == NULL) {
6398 en = str + wcslen(str);
6399 }
6400
6401 *begin = beg;
6402 *end = en;
6403 return;
6404}
6405#endif /* FT_HAVE_WCHAR */
6406
6407#if defined(FT_HAVE_UTF8)
6408FT_INTERNAL
6409void utf8_n_substring(const void *str, utf8_int32_t ch_separator, size_t n, const void **begin, const void **end)
6410{
6411 const char *beg = (const char *)utf8_n_substring_beg(str, ch_separator, n);
6412 if (beg == NULL) {
6413 *begin = NULL;
6414 *end = NULL;
6415 return;
6416 }
6417
6418 const char *en = (const char *)utf8chr(beg, ch_separator);
6419 if (en == NULL) {
6420 en = (const char *)str + strlen((const char *)str);
6421 }
6422
6423 *begin = beg;
6424 *end = en;
6425 return;
6426}
6427#endif /* FT_HAVE_UTF8 */
6428
6429
6430
6431FT_INTERNAL
6432f_string_buffer_t *create_string_buffer(size_t n_chars, enum f_string_type type)
6433{
6434 size_t char_sz = 0;
6435 switch (type) {
6436 case CHAR_BUF:
6437 char_sz = 1;
6438 break;
6439#ifdef FT_HAVE_WCHAR
6440 case W_CHAR_BUF:
6441 char_sz = sizeof(wchar_t);
6442 break;
6443#endif
6444#ifdef FT_HAVE_UTF8
6445 case UTF8_BUF:
6446 char_sz = 4;
6447 break;
6448#endif
6449 }
6450
6451 size_t sz = n_chars * char_sz;
6452 f_string_buffer_t *result = (f_string_buffer_t *)F_MALLOC(sizeof(f_string_buffer_t));
6453 if (result == NULL)
6454 return NULL;
6455 result->str.data = F_MALLOC(sz);
6456 if (result->str.data == NULL) {
6457 F_FREE(result);
6458 return NULL;
6459 }
6460 result->data_sz = sz;
6461 result->type = type;
6462
6463 if (sz) {
6464 switch (type) {
6465 case CHAR_BUF:
6466 result->str.cstr[0] = '\0';
6467 break;
6468#ifdef FT_HAVE_WCHAR
6469 case W_CHAR_BUF:
6470 result->str.wstr[0] = L'\0';
6471 break;
6472#endif
6473#ifdef FT_HAVE_UTF8
6474 case UTF8_BUF:
6475 result->str.cstr[0] = '\0';
6476 break;
6477#endif
6478 }
6479 }
6480
6481 return result;
6482}
6483
6484
6485FT_INTERNAL
6486void destroy_string_buffer(f_string_buffer_t *buffer)
6487{
6488 if (buffer == NULL)
6489 return;
6490 F_FREE(buffer->str.data);
6491 buffer->str.data = NULL;
6492 F_FREE(buffer);
6493}
6494
6495FT_INTERNAL
6496f_string_buffer_t *copy_string_buffer(const f_string_buffer_t *buffer)
6497{
6498 assert(buffer);
6499 f_string_buffer_t *result = create_string_buffer(buffer->data_sz, buffer->type);
6500 if (result == NULL)
6501 return NULL;
6502 switch (buffer->type) {
6503 case CHAR_BUF:
6504 if (FT_IS_ERROR(fill_buffer_from_string(result, buffer->str.cstr))) {
6505 destroy_string_buffer(result);
6506 return NULL;
6507 }
6508 break;
6509#ifdef FT_HAVE_WCHAR
6510 case W_CHAR_BUF:
6511 if (FT_IS_ERROR(fill_buffer_from_wstring(result, buffer->str.wstr))) {
6512 destroy_string_buffer(result);
6513 return NULL;
6514 }
6515 break;
6516#endif /* FT_HAVE_WCHAR */
6517 default:
6518 destroy_string_buffer(result);
6519 return NULL;
6520 }
6521 return result;
6522}
6523
6524FT_INTERNAL
6525f_status realloc_string_buffer_without_copy(f_string_buffer_t *buffer)
6526{
6527 assert(buffer);
6528 char *new_str = (char *)F_MALLOC(buffer->data_sz * 2);
6529 if (new_str == NULL) {
6530 return FT_MEMORY_ERROR;
6531 }
6532 F_FREE(buffer->str.data);
6533 buffer->str.data = new_str;
6534 buffer->data_sz *= 2;
6535 return FT_SUCCESS;
6536}
6537
6538
6539FT_INTERNAL
6540f_status fill_buffer_from_string(f_string_buffer_t *buffer, const char *str)
6541{
6542 assert(buffer);
6543 assert(str);
6544
6545 char *copy = F_STRDUP(str);
6546 if (copy == NULL)
6547 return FT_MEMORY_ERROR;
6548
6549 F_FREE(buffer->str.data);
6550 buffer->str.cstr = copy;
6551 buffer->type = CHAR_BUF;
6552
6553 return FT_SUCCESS;
6554}
6555
6556
6557#ifdef FT_HAVE_WCHAR
6558FT_INTERNAL
6559f_status fill_buffer_from_wstring(f_string_buffer_t *buffer, const wchar_t *str)
6560{
6561 assert(buffer);
6562 assert(str);
6563
6564 wchar_t *copy = F_WCSDUP(str);
6565 if (copy == NULL)
6566 return FT_MEMORY_ERROR;
6567
6568 F_FREE(buffer->str.data);
6569 buffer->str.wstr = copy;
6570 buffer->type = W_CHAR_BUF;
6571
6572 return FT_SUCCESS;
6573}
6574#endif /* FT_HAVE_WCHAR */
6575
6576#ifdef FT_HAVE_UTF8
6577FT_INTERNAL
6578f_status fill_buffer_from_u8string(f_string_buffer_t *buffer, const void *str)
6579{
6580 assert(buffer);
6581 assert(str);
6582
6583 void *copy = F_UTF8DUP(str);
6584 if (copy == NULL)
6585 return FT_MEMORY_ERROR;
6586
6587 F_FREE(buffer->str.u8str);
6588 buffer->str.u8str = copy;
6589 buffer->type = UTF8_BUF;
6590
6591 return FT_SUCCESS;
6592}
6593#endif /* FT_HAVE_UTF8 */
6594
6595FT_INTERNAL
6596size_t buffer_text_visible_height(const f_string_buffer_t *buffer)
6597{
6598 if (buffer == NULL || buffer->str.data == NULL || buf_str_len(buffer) == 0) {
6599 return 0;
6600 }
6601 if (buffer->type == CHAR_BUF)
6602 return 1 + strchr_count(buffer->str.cstr, '\n');
6603#ifdef FT_HAVE_WCHAR
6604 else if (buffer->type == W_CHAR_BUF)
6605 return 1 + wstrchr_count(buffer->str.wstr, L'\n');
6606#endif /* FT_HAVE_WCHAR */
6607#ifdef FT_HAVE_UTF8
6608 else if (buffer->type == UTF8_BUF)
6609 return 1 + utf8chr_count(buffer->str.u8str, '\n');
6610#endif /* FT_HAVE_WCHAR */
6611
6612 assert(0);
6613 return 0;
6614}
6615
6616FT_INTERNAL
6617size_t string_buffer_cod_width_capacity(const f_string_buffer_t *buffer)
6618{
6619 return string_buffer_width_capacity(buffer);
6620}
6621
6622FT_INTERNAL
6623size_t string_buffer_raw_capacity(const f_string_buffer_t *buffer)
6624{
6625 return buffer->data_sz;
6626}
6627
6628#ifdef FT_HAVE_UTF8
6629/* User provided function to compute utf8 string visible width */
6630static int (*_custom_u8strwid)(const void *beg, const void *end, size_t *width) = NULL;
6631
6632FT_INTERNAL
6633void buffer_set_u8strwid_func(int (*u8strwid)(const void *beg, const void *end, size_t *width))
6634{
6635 _custom_u8strwid = u8strwid;
6636}
6637
6638static
6639size_t utf8_width(const void *beg, const void *end)
6640{
6641 if (_custom_u8strwid) {
6642 size_t width = 0;
6643 if (!_custom_u8strwid(beg, end, &width))
6644 return width;
6645 }
6646
6647 size_t sz = (size_t)((const char *)end - (const char *)beg);
6648 char *tmp = (char *)F_MALLOC(sizeof(char) * (sz + 1));
6649 // @todo: add check to tmp
6650 assert(tmp);
6651
6652 memcpy(tmp, beg, sz);
6653 tmp[sz] = '\0';
6654 size_t result = utf8width(tmp);
6655 F_FREE(tmp);
6656 return result;
6657}
6658#endif /* FT_HAVE_WCHAR */
6659
6660FT_INTERNAL
6661size_t buffer_text_visible_width(const f_string_buffer_t *buffer)
6662{
6663 size_t max_length = 0;
6664 if (buffer->type == CHAR_BUF) {
6665 size_t n = 0;
6666 while (1) {
6667 const char *beg = NULL;
6668 const char *end = NULL;
6669 str_n_substring(buffer->str.cstr, '\n', n, &beg, &end);
6670 if (beg == NULL || end == NULL)
6671 return max_length;
6672
6673 max_length = MAX(max_length, (size_t)(end - beg));
6674 ++n;
6675 }
6676#ifdef FT_HAVE_WCHAR
6677 } else if (buffer->type == W_CHAR_BUF) {
6678 size_t n = 0;
6679 while (1) {
6680 const wchar_t *beg = NULL;
6681 const wchar_t *end = NULL;
6682 wstr_n_substring(buffer->str.wstr, L'\n', n, &beg, &end);
6683 if (beg == NULL || end == NULL)
6684 return max_length;
6685
6686 int line_width = mk_wcswidth(beg, (size_t)(end - beg));
6687 if (line_width < 0) /* For safety */
6688 line_width = 0;
6689 max_length = MAX(max_length, (size_t)line_width);
6690
6691 ++n;
6692 }
6693#endif /* FT_HAVE_WCHAR */
6694#ifdef FT_HAVE_UTF8
6695 } else if (buffer->type == UTF8_BUF) {
6696 size_t n = 0;
6697 while (1) {
6698 const void *beg = NULL;
6699 const void *end = NULL;
6700 utf8_n_substring(buffer->str.u8str, '\n', n, &beg, &end);
6701 if (beg == NULL || end == NULL)
6702 return max_length;
6703
6704 max_length = MAX(max_length, (size_t)utf8_width(beg, end));
6705 ++n;
6706 }
6707#endif /* FT_HAVE_WCHAR */
6708 }
6709
6710 return max_length; /* shouldn't be here */
6711}
6712
6713
6714static void
6715buffer_substring(const f_string_buffer_t *buffer, size_t buffer_row, const void **begin, const void **end, ptrdiff_t *str_it_width)
6716{
6717 switch (buffer->type) {
6718 case CHAR_BUF:
6719 str_n_substring(buffer->str.cstr, '\n', buffer_row, (const char **)begin, (const char **)end);
6720 if ((*(const char **)begin) && (*(const char **)end))
6721 *str_it_width = str_iter_width(*(const char **)begin, *(const char **)end);
6722 break;
6723#ifdef FT_HAVE_WCHAR
6724 case W_CHAR_BUF:
6725 wstr_n_substring(buffer->str.wstr, L'\n', buffer_row, (const wchar_t **)begin, (const wchar_t **)end);
6726 if ((*(const wchar_t **)begin) && (*(const wchar_t **)end))
6727 *str_it_width = wcs_iter_width(*(const wchar_t **)begin, *(const wchar_t **)end);
6728 break;
6729#endif /* FT_HAVE_WCHAR */
6730#ifdef FT_HAVE_UTF8
6731 case UTF8_BUF:
6732 utf8_n_substring(buffer->str.u8str, '\n', buffer_row, begin, end);
6733 if ((*(const char **)begin) && (*(const char **)end))
6734 *str_it_width = utf8_width(*begin, *end);
6735 break;
6736#endif /* FT_HAVE_UTF8 */
6737 default:
6738 assert(0);
6739 }
6740}
6741
6742
6743static int
6744buffer_print_range(f_conv_context_t *cntx, const void *beg, const void *end)
6745{
6746 int len;
6747 switch (cntx->b_type) {
6748 case CHAR_BUF:
6749 len = (int)((const char *)end - (const char *)beg);
6750 return ft_nprint(cntx, (const char *)beg, len);
6751#ifdef FT_HAVE_WCHAR
6752 case W_CHAR_BUF:
6753 len = (int)((const wchar_t *)end - (const wchar_t *)beg);
6754 return ft_nwprint(cntx, (const wchar_t *)beg, len);
6755#endif /* FT_HAVE_WCHAR */
6756#ifdef FT_HAVE_UTF8
6757 case UTF8_BUF:
6758 return ft_nu8print(cntx, beg, end);
6759#endif /* FT_HAVE_UTF8 */
6760 default:
6761 assert(0);
6762 return -1;
6763 }
6764}
6765
6766
6767FT_INTERNAL
6768int buffer_printf(f_string_buffer_t *buffer, size_t buffer_row, f_conv_context_t *cntx, size_t vis_width,
6769 const char *content_style_tag, const char *reset_content_style_tag)
6770{
6771 const f_context_t *context = cntx->cntx;
6772 f_table_properties_t *props = context->table_properties;
6773 size_t row = context->row;
6774 size_t column = context->column;
6775
6776 if (buffer == NULL || buffer->str.data == NULL
6777 || buffer_row >= buffer_text_visible_height(buffer)) {
6778 return -1;
6779 }
6780
6781 size_t content_width = buffer_text_visible_width(buffer);
6782 if (vis_width < content_width)
6783 return -1;
6784
6785 size_t left = 0;
6786 size_t right = 0;
6787 switch (get_cell_property_hierarchically(props, row, column, FT_CPROP_TEXT_ALIGN)) {
6788 case FT_ALIGNED_LEFT:
6789 left = 0;
6790 right = (vis_width) - content_width;
6791 break;
6792 case FT_ALIGNED_CENTER:
6793 left = ((vis_width) - content_width) / 2;
6794 right = ((vis_width) - content_width) - left;
6795 break;
6796 case FT_ALIGNED_RIGHT:
6797 left = (vis_width) - content_width;
6798 right = 0;
6799 break;
6800 default:
6801 assert(0);
6802 break;
6803 }
6804
6805 size_t written = 0;
6806 int tmp = 0;
6807 ptrdiff_t str_it_width = 0;
6808 const void *beg = NULL;
6809 const void *end = NULL;
6810 buffer_substring(buffer, buffer_row, &beg, &end, &str_it_width);
6811 if (beg == NULL || end == NULL)
6812 return -1;
6813 if (str_it_width < 0 || content_width < (size_t)str_it_width)
6814 return -1;
6815
6816 size_t padding = content_width - (size_t)str_it_width;
6817
6818 CHCK_RSLT_ADD_TO_WRITTEN(print_n_strings(cntx, left, FT_SPACE));
6819 CHCK_RSLT_ADD_TO_WRITTEN(print_n_strings(cntx, 1, content_style_tag));
6820 CHCK_RSLT_ADD_TO_WRITTEN(buffer_print_range(cntx, beg, end));
6821 CHCK_RSLT_ADD_TO_WRITTEN(print_n_strings(cntx, 1, reset_content_style_tag));
6822 CHCK_RSLT_ADD_TO_WRITTEN(print_n_strings(cntx, padding, FT_SPACE));
6823 CHCK_RSLT_ADD_TO_WRITTEN(print_n_strings(cntx, right, FT_SPACE));
6824 return (int)written;
6825
6826clear:
6827 return -1;
6828}
6829
6830FT_INTERNAL
6831size_t string_buffer_width_capacity(const f_string_buffer_t *buffer)
6832{
6833 assert(buffer);
6834 switch (buffer->type) {
6835 case CHAR_BUF:
6836 return buffer->data_sz;
6837#ifdef FT_HAVE_WCHAR
6838 case W_CHAR_BUF:
6839 return buffer->data_sz / sizeof(wchar_t);
6840#endif
6841#ifdef FT_HAVE_UTF8
6842 case UTF8_BUF:
6843 return buffer->data_sz / 4;
6844#endif
6845 default:
6846 assert(0);
6847 return 0;
6848 }
6849}
6850
6851
6852FT_INTERNAL
6853void *buffer_get_data(f_string_buffer_t *buffer)
6854{
6855 assert(buffer);
6856 return buffer->str.data;
6857}
6858
6859FT_INTERNAL
6860int buffer_check_align(f_string_buffer_t *buffer)
6861{
6862 assert(buffer);
6863 assert(buffer->str.data);
6864
6865 switch (buffer->type) {
6866 case CHAR_BUF:
6867 return 1;
6868#ifdef FT_HAVE_WCHAR
6869 case W_CHAR_BUF:
6870 return (((uintptr_t)buffer->str.data) & (sizeof(wchar_t) - 1)) == 0;
6871#endif
6872#ifdef FT_HAVE_UTF8
6873 case UTF8_BUF:
6874 return 1;
6875#endif
6876 default:
6877 assert(0);
6878 return 0;
6879 }
6880}
6881
6882/********************************************************
6883 End of file "string_buffer.c"
6884 ********************************************************/
6885
6886
6887/********************************************************
6888 Begin of file "table.c"
6889 ********************************************************/
6890
6891/* #include "table.h" */ /* Commented by amalgamation script */
6892/* #include "string_buffer.h" */ /* Commented by amalgamation script */
6893/* #include "cell.h" */ /* Commented by amalgamation script */
6894/* #include "vector.h" */ /* Commented by amalgamation script */
6895/* #include "row.h" */ /* Commented by amalgamation script */
6896
6897FT_INTERNAL
6898f_separator_t *create_separator(int enabled)
6899{
6900 f_separator_t *res = (f_separator_t *)F_CALLOC(1, sizeof(f_separator_t));
6901 if (res == NULL)
6902 return NULL;
6903 res->enabled = enabled;
6904 return res;
6905}
6906
6907
6908FT_INTERNAL
6909void destroy_separator(f_separator_t *sep)
6910{
6911 F_FREE(sep);
6912}
6913
6914
6915FT_INTERNAL
6916f_separator_t *copy_separator(f_separator_t *sep)
6917{
6918 assert(sep);
6919 return create_separator(sep->enabled);
6920}
6921
6922
6923static
6924f_row_t *get_row_impl(ft_table_t *table, size_t row, enum f_get_policy policy)
6925{
6926 if (table == NULL || table->rows == NULL) {
6927 return NULL;
6928 }
6929
6930 switch (policy) {
6931 case DONT_CREATE_ON_NULL:
6932 if (row < vector_size(table->rows)) {
6933 return VECTOR_AT(table->rows, row, f_row_t *);
6934 }
6935 return NULL;
6936 case CREATE_ON_NULL:
6937 while (row >= vector_size(table->rows)) {
6938 f_row_t *new_row = create_row();
6939 if (new_row == NULL)
6940 return NULL;
6941 if (FT_IS_ERROR(vector_push(table->rows, &new_row))) {
6942 destroy_row(new_row);
6943 return NULL;
6944 }
6945 }
6946 return VECTOR_AT(table->rows, row, f_row_t *);
6947 }
6948
6949 assert(0 && "Shouldn't be here!");
6950 return NULL;
6951}
6952
6953
6954FT_INTERNAL
6955f_row_t *get_row(ft_table_t *table, size_t row)
6956{
6957 return get_row_impl(table, row, DONT_CREATE_ON_NULL);
6958}
6959
6960
6961FT_INTERNAL
6962const f_row_t *get_row_c(const ft_table_t *table, size_t row)
6963{
6964 return get_row((ft_table_t *)table, row);
6965}
6966
6967
6968FT_INTERNAL
6969f_row_t *get_row_and_create_if_not_exists(ft_table_t *table, size_t row)
6970{
6971 return get_row_impl(table, row, CREATE_ON_NULL);
6972}
6973
6974FT_INTERNAL
6975f_string_buffer_t *get_cur_str_buffer_and_create_if_not_exists(ft_table_t *table)
6976{
6977 assert(table);
6978
6979 f_row_t *row = get_row_and_create_if_not_exists(table, table->cur_row);
6980 if (row == NULL)
6981 return NULL;
6982
6983 f_cell_t *cell = NULL;
6984 fort_entire_table_properties_t *table_props = &table->properties->entire_table_properties;
6985 switch (table_props->add_strategy) {
6986 case FT_STRATEGY_INSERT:
6987 cell = create_cell_in_position(row, table->cur_col);
6988 break;
6989 case FT_STRATEGY_REPLACE:
6990 cell = get_cell_and_create_if_not_exists(row, table->cur_col);
6991 break;
6992 default:
6993 assert(0 && "Unexpected situation inside libfort");
6994 break;
6995 }
6996
6997 if (cell == NULL)
6998 return NULL;
6999
7000 return cell_get_string_buffer(cell);
7001}
7002
7003
7004/*
7005 * Returns number of cells (rows * cols)
7006 */
7007FT_INTERNAL
7008f_status get_table_sizes(const ft_table_t *table, size_t *rows, size_t *cols)
7009{
7010 *rows = 0;
7011 *cols = 0;
7012 if (table && table->rows) {
7013 *rows = vector_size(table->rows);
7014 size_t row_index = 0;
7015 for (row_index = 0; row_index < vector_size(table->rows); ++row_index) {
7016 f_row_t *row = VECTOR_AT(table->rows, row_index, f_row_t *);
7017 size_t cols_in_row = columns_in_row(row);
7018 if (cols_in_row > *cols)
7019 *cols = cols_in_row;
7020 }
7021 }
7022 return FT_SUCCESS;
7023}
7024
7025
7026FT_INTERNAL
7027f_status table_rows_and_cols_geometry(const ft_table_t *table,
7028 size_t **col_width_arr_p, size_t *col_width_arr_sz,
7029 size_t **row_height_arr_p, size_t *row_height_arr_sz,
7030 enum f_geometry_type geom)
7031{
7032 if (table == NULL) {
7033 return FT_GEN_ERROR;
7034 }
7035
7036 size_t max_invis_codepoints = 0;
7037 size_t cols = 0;
7038 size_t rows = 0;
7039 int status = get_table_sizes(table, &rows, &cols);
7040 if (FT_IS_ERROR(status))
7041 return status;
7042
7043 size_t *col_width_arr = (size_t *)F_CALLOC(cols, sizeof(size_t));
7044 size_t *row_height_arr = (size_t *)F_CALLOC(rows, sizeof(size_t));
7045 if (col_width_arr == NULL || row_height_arr == NULL) {
7046 F_FREE(col_width_arr);
7047 F_FREE(row_height_arr);
7048 return FT_GEN_ERROR;
7049 }
7050
7051 int combined_cells_found = 0;
7052 f_context_t context;
7053 context.table_properties = (table->properties ? table->properties : &g_table_properties);
7054 size_t col = 0;
7055 for (col = 0; col < cols; ++col) {
7056 col_width_arr[col] = 0;
7057 size_t row = 0;
7058 for (row = 0; row < rows; ++row) {
7059 const f_row_t *row_p = get_row_c(table, row);
7060 const f_cell_t *cell = get_cell_c(row_p, col);
7061 context.column = col;
7062 context.row = row;
7063 if (cell) {
7064 switch (get_cell_type(cell)) {
7065 case COMMON_CELL:
7066 col_width_arr[col] = MAX(col_width_arr[col], cell_vis_width(cell, &context));
7067 break;
7068 case GROUP_MASTER_CELL:
7069 combined_cells_found = 1;
7070 break;
7071 case GROUP_SLAVE_CELL:
7072 ; /* Do nothing */
7073 break;
7074 }
7075 row_height_arr[row] = MAX(row_height_arr[row], hint_height_cell(cell, &context));
7076 } else {
7077 size_t cell_empty_string_height = get_cell_property_hierarchically(context.table_properties, context.row, context.column, FT_CPROP_EMPTY_STR_HEIGHT);
7078 if (cell_empty_string_height) {
7079 size_t cell_top_padding = get_cell_property_hierarchically(context.table_properties, context.row, context.column, FT_CPROP_TOP_PADDING);
7080 size_t cell_bottom_padding = get_cell_property_hierarchically(context.table_properties, context.row, context.column, FT_CPROP_BOTTOM_PADDING);
7081 row_height_arr[row] = MAX(row_height_arr[row], cell_empty_string_height + cell_top_padding + cell_bottom_padding);
7082 }
7083 }
7084 }
7085
7086 if (geom == INTERN_REPR_GEOMETRY) {
7087 max_invis_codepoints = 0;
7088 for (row = 0; row < rows; ++row) {
7089 const f_row_t *row_p = get_row_c(table, row);
7090 const f_cell_t *cell = get_cell_c(row_p, col);
7091 if (!cell)
7092 continue;
7093 context.column = col;
7094 context.row = row;
7095 size_t inv_codepoints = cell_invis_codes_width(cell, &context);
7096 max_invis_codepoints = MAX(max_invis_codepoints, inv_codepoints);
7097 }
7098 col_width_arr[col] += max_invis_codepoints;
7099 }
7100 }
7101
7102 if (combined_cells_found) {
7103 for (col = 0; col < cols; ++col) {
7104 size_t row = 0;
7105 for (row = 0; row < rows; ++row) {
7106 const f_row_t *row_p = get_row_c(table, row);
7107 const f_cell_t *cell = get_cell_c(row_p, col);
7108 context.column = col;
7109 context.row = row;
7110 if (cell) {
7111 if (get_cell_type(cell) == GROUP_MASTER_CELL) {
7112 size_t hint_width = cell_vis_width(cell, &context);
7113 if (geom == INTERN_REPR_GEOMETRY) {
7114 hint_width += cell_invis_codes_width(cell, &context);
7115 }
7116 size_t slave_col = col + group_cell_number(row_p, col);
7117 size_t cur_adj_col = col;
7118 size_t group_width = col_width_arr[col];
7119 size_t i;
7120 for (i = col + 1; i < slave_col; ++i)
7121 group_width += col_width_arr[i] + FORT_COL_SEPARATOR_LENGTH;
7122 /* adjust col. widths */
7123 while (1) {
7124 if (group_width >= hint_width)
7125 break;
7126 col_width_arr[cur_adj_col] += 1;
7127 group_width++;
7128 cur_adj_col++;
7129 if (cur_adj_col == slave_col)
7130 cur_adj_col = col;
7131 }
7132 }
7133 }
7134 }
7135 }
7136 }
7137
7138 /* todo: Maybe it is better to move min width checking to a particular cell
7139 * width checking. At the moment min width includes paddings. Maybe it is
7140 * better that min width weren't include paddings but be min width of the
7141 * cell content without padding
7142 */
7143 /*
7144 if (table->properties) {
7145 for (size_t i = 0; i < cols; ++i) {
7146 col_width_arr[i] = MAX((int)col_width_arr[i], fort_props_column_width(table->properties, i));
7147 }
7148 }
7149 */
7150
7151 *col_width_arr_p = col_width_arr;
7152 *col_width_arr_sz = cols;
7153 *row_height_arr_p = row_height_arr;
7154 *row_height_arr_sz = rows;
7155 return FT_SUCCESS;
7156}
7157
7158
7159/*
7160 * Returns geometry in characters
7161 */
7162FT_INTERNAL
7163f_status table_geometry(const ft_table_t *table, size_t *height, size_t *width)
7164{
7165 if (table == NULL)
7166 return FT_GEN_ERROR;
7167
7168 *height = 0;
7169 *width = 0;
7170 size_t cols = 0;
7171 size_t rows = 0;
7172 size_t *col_width_arr = NULL;
7173 size_t *row_height_arr = NULL;
7174
7175 int status = table_rows_and_cols_geometry(table, &col_width_arr, &cols, &row_height_arr, &rows, INTERN_REPR_GEOMETRY);
7176 if (FT_IS_ERROR(status))
7177 return status;
7178
7179 *width = 1 + (cols == 0 ? 1 : cols) + 1; /* for boundaries (that take 1 symbol) + newline */
7180 size_t i = 0;
7181 for (i = 0; i < cols; ++i) {
7182 *width += col_width_arr[i];
7183 }
7184
7185 /* todo: add check for non printable horizontal row separators */
7186 *height = 1 + (rows == 0 ? 1 : rows); /* for boundaries (that take 1 symbol) */
7187 for (i = 0; i < rows; ++i) {
7188 *height += row_height_arr[i];
7189 }
7190 F_FREE(col_width_arr);
7191 F_FREE(row_height_arr);
7192
7193 f_table_properties_t *properties = table->properties;
7194 if (properties) {
7195 *height += properties->entire_table_properties.top_margin;
7196 *height += properties->entire_table_properties.bottom_margin;
7197 *width += properties->entire_table_properties.left_margin;
7198 *width += properties->entire_table_properties.right_margin;
7199 }
7200
7201 /* Take into account that border elements can be more than one byte long */
7202 f_table_properties_t *table_properties = properties ? properties : &g_table_properties;
7203 size_t max_border_elem_len = max_border_elem_strlen(table_properties);
7204 *width *= max_border_elem_len;
7205
7206 return FT_SUCCESS;
7207}
7208
7209FT_INTERNAL
7210f_status table_internal_codepoints_geometry(const ft_table_t *table, size_t *height, size_t *width)
7211{
7212 return table_geometry(table, height, width);
7213}
7214
7215/********************************************************
7216 End of file "table.c"
7217 ********************************************************/
7218
7219
7220/********************************************************
7221 Begin of file "vector.c"
7222 ********************************************************/
7223
7224/* #include "vector.h" */ /* Commented by amalgamation script */
7225#include <assert.h>
7226#include <string.h>
7227
7228struct f_vector {
7229 size_t m_size;
7230 void *m_data;
7231 size_t m_capacity;
7232 size_t m_item_size;
7233};
7234
7235
7236static int vector_reallocate_(f_vector_t *vector, size_t new_capacity)
7237{
7238 assert(vector);
7239 assert(new_capacity > vector->m_capacity);
7240
7241 size_t new_size = new_capacity * vector->m_item_size;
7242 vector->m_data = F_REALLOC(vector->m_data, new_size);
7243 if (vector->m_data == NULL)
7244 return -1;
7245 return 0;
7246}
7247
7248
7249FT_INTERNAL
7250f_vector_t *create_vector(size_t item_size, size_t capacity)
7251{
7252 f_vector_t *vector = (f_vector_t *)F_MALLOC(sizeof(f_vector_t));
7253 if (vector == NULL) {
7254 return NULL;
7255 }
7256
7257 size_t init_size = MAX(item_size * capacity, 1);
7258 vector->m_data = F_MALLOC(init_size);
7259 if (vector->m_data == NULL) {
7260 F_FREE(vector);
7261 return NULL;
7262 }
7263
7264 vector->m_size = 0;
7265 vector->m_capacity = capacity;
7266 vector->m_item_size = item_size;
7267
7268 return vector;
7269}
7270
7271
7272FT_INTERNAL
7273void destroy_vector(f_vector_t *vector)
7274{
7275 assert(vector);
7276 F_FREE(vector->m_data);
7277 F_FREE(vector);
7278}
7279
7280
7281FT_INTERNAL
7282size_t vector_size(const f_vector_t *vector)
7283{
7284 assert(vector);
7285 return vector->m_size;
7286}
7287
7288
7289FT_INTERNAL
7290size_t vector_capacity(const f_vector_t *vector)
7291{
7292 assert(vector);
7293 return vector->m_capacity;
7294}
7295
7296
7297FT_INTERNAL
7298int vector_push(f_vector_t *vector, const void *item)
7299{
7300 assert(vector);
7301 assert(item);
7302
7303 if (vector->m_size == vector->m_capacity) {
7304 if (vector_reallocate_(vector, vector->m_capacity * 2) == -1)
7305 return FT_GEN_ERROR;
7306 vector->m_capacity = vector->m_capacity * 2;
7307 }
7308
7309 size_t offset = vector->m_size * vector->m_item_size;
7310 memcpy((char *)vector->m_data + offset, item, vector->m_item_size);
7311
7312 ++(vector->m_size);
7313
7314 return FT_SUCCESS;
7315}
7316
7317FT_INTERNAL
7318int vector_insert(f_vector_t *vector, const void *item, size_t pos)
7319{
7320 assert(vector);
7321 assert(item);
7322 size_t needed_capacity = MAX(pos + 1, vector->m_size + 1);
7323 if (vector->m_capacity < needed_capacity) {
7324 if (vector_reallocate_(vector, needed_capacity) == -1)
7325 return FT_GEN_ERROR;
7326 vector->m_capacity = needed_capacity;
7327 }
7328 size_t offset = pos * vector->m_item_size;
7329 if (pos >= vector->m_size) {
7330 /* Data in the middle are not initialized */
7331 memcpy((char *)vector->m_data + offset, item, vector->m_item_size);
7332 vector->m_size = pos + 1;
7333 return FT_SUCCESS;
7334 } else {
7335 /* Shift following data by one position */
7336 memmove((char *)vector->m_data + offset + vector->m_item_size,
7337 (char *)vector->m_data + offset,
7338 vector->m_item_size * (vector->m_size - pos));
7339 memcpy((char *)vector->m_data + offset, item, vector->m_item_size);
7340 ++(vector->m_size);
7341 return FT_SUCCESS;
7342 }
7343}
7344
7345FT_INTERNAL
7346f_vector_t *vector_split(f_vector_t *vector, size_t pos)
7347{
7348 size_t trailing_sz = vector->m_size > pos ? vector->m_size - pos : 0;
7349 f_vector_t *new_vector = create_vector(vector->m_item_size, trailing_sz);
7350 if (!new_vector)
7351 return new_vector;
7352 if (new_vector->m_capacity < trailing_sz) {
7353 destroy_vector(new_vector);
7354 return NULL;
7355 }
7356
7357 if (trailing_sz == 0)
7358 return new_vector;
7359
7360 size_t offset = vector->m_item_size * pos;
7361 memcpy(new_vector->m_data, (char *)vector->m_data + offset,
7362 trailing_sz * vector->m_item_size);
7363 new_vector->m_size = trailing_sz;
7364 vector->m_size = pos;
7365 return new_vector;
7366}
7367
7368FT_INTERNAL
7369const void *vector_at_c(const f_vector_t *vector, size_t index)
7370{
7371 if (index >= vector->m_size)
7372 return NULL;
7373
7374 return (char *)vector->m_data + index * vector->m_item_size;
7375}
7376
7377
7378FT_INTERNAL
7379void *vector_at(f_vector_t *vector, size_t index)
7380{
7381 if (index >= vector->m_size)
7382 return NULL;
7383
7384 return (char *)vector->m_data + index * vector->m_item_size;
7385}
7386
7387
7388FT_INTERNAL
7389f_status vector_swap(f_vector_t *cur_vec, f_vector_t *mv_vec, size_t pos)
7390{
7391 assert(cur_vec);
7392 assert(mv_vec);
7393 assert(cur_vec != mv_vec);
7394 assert(cur_vec->m_item_size == mv_vec->m_item_size);
7395
7396 size_t cur_sz = vector_size(cur_vec);
7397 size_t mv_sz = vector_size(mv_vec);
7398 if (mv_sz == 0) {
7399 return FT_SUCCESS;
7400 }
7401
7402 size_t min_targ_size = pos + mv_sz;
7403 if (vector_capacity(cur_vec) < min_targ_size) {
7404 if (vector_reallocate_(cur_vec, min_targ_size) == -1)
7405 return FT_GEN_ERROR;
7406 cur_vec->m_capacity = min_targ_size;
7407 }
7408
7409 size_t offset = pos * cur_vec->m_item_size;
7410 void *tmp = NULL;
7411 size_t new_mv_sz = 0;
7412 if (cur_sz > pos) {
7413 new_mv_sz = MIN(cur_sz - pos, mv_sz);
7414 tmp = F_MALLOC(cur_vec->m_item_size * new_mv_sz);
7415 if (tmp == NULL) {
7416 return FT_MEMORY_ERROR;
7417 }
7418 }
7419
7420 if (tmp) {
7421 memcpy(tmp,
7422 (char *)cur_vec->m_data + offset,
7423 cur_vec->m_item_size * new_mv_sz);
7424 }
7425
7426 memcpy((char *)cur_vec->m_data + offset,
7427 mv_vec->m_data,
7428 cur_vec->m_item_size * mv_sz);
7429
7430 if (tmp) {
7431 memcpy(mv_vec->m_data,
7432 tmp,
7433 cur_vec->m_item_size * new_mv_sz);
7434 }
7435
7436 cur_vec->m_size = MAX(cur_vec->m_size, min_targ_size);
7437 mv_vec->m_size = new_mv_sz;
7438 F_FREE(tmp);
7439 return FT_SUCCESS;
7440}
7441
7442FT_INTERNAL
7443void vector_clear(f_vector_t *vector)
7444{
7445 vector->m_size = 0;
7446}
7447
7448FT_INTERNAL
7449int vector_erase(f_vector_t *vector, size_t index)
7450{
7451 assert(vector);
7452
7453 if (vector->m_size == 0 || index >= vector->m_size)
7454 return FT_GEN_ERROR;
7455
7456 memmove((char *)vector->m_data + vector->m_item_size * index,
7457 (char *)vector->m_data + vector->m_item_size * (index + 1),
7458 (vector->m_size - 1 - index) * vector->m_item_size);
7459 vector->m_size--;
7460 return FT_SUCCESS;
7461}
7462
7463#ifdef FT_TEST_BUILD
7464
7465f_vector_t *copy_vector(f_vector_t *v)
7466{
7467 if (v == NULL)
7468 return NULL;
7469
7470 f_vector_t *new_vector = create_vector(v->m_item_size, v->m_capacity);
7471 if (new_vector == NULL)
7472 return NULL;
7473
7474 memcpy(new_vector->m_data, v->m_data, v->m_item_size * v->m_size);
7475 new_vector->m_size = v->m_size ;
7476 new_vector->m_item_size = v->m_item_size ;
7477 return new_vector;
7478}
7479
7480size_t vector_index_of(const f_vector_t *vector, const void *item)
7481{
7482 assert(vector);
7483 assert(item);
7484
7485 size_t i = 0;
7486 for (i = 0; i < vector->m_size; ++i) {
7487 void *data_pos = (char *)vector->m_data + i * vector->m_item_size;
7488 if (memcmp(data_pos, item, vector->m_item_size) == 0) {
7489 return i;
7490 }
7491 }
7492 return INVALID_VEC_INDEX;
7493}
7494
7495#endif
7496
7497/********************************************************
7498 End of file "vector.c"
7499 ********************************************************/
7500
7501
7502/********************************************************
7503 Begin of file "wcwidth.c"
7504 ********************************************************/
7505
7506/*
7507 * This is an implementation of wcwidth() and wcswidth() (defined in
7508 * IEEE Std 1002.1-2001) for Unicode.
7509 *
7510 * http://www.opengroup.org/onlinepubs/007904975/functions/wcwidth.html
7511 * http://www.opengroup.org/onlinepubs/007904975/functions/wcswidth.html
7512 *
7513 * In fixed-width output devices, Latin characters all occupy a single
7514 * "cell" position of equal width, whereas ideographic CJK characters
7515 * occupy two such cells. Interoperability between terminal-line
7516 * applications and (teletype-style) character terminals using the
7517 * UTF-8 encoding requires agreement on which character should advance
7518 * the cursor by how many cell positions. No established formal
7519 * standards exist at present on which Unicode character shall occupy
7520 * how many cell positions on character terminals. These routines are
7521 * a first attempt of defining such behavior based on simple rules
7522 * applied to data provided by the Unicode Consortium.
7523 *
7524 * For some graphical characters, the Unicode standard explicitly
7525 * defines a character-cell width via the definition of the East Asian
7526 * FullWidth (F), Wide (W), Half-width (H), and Narrow (Na) classes.
7527 * In all these cases, there is no ambiguity about which width a
7528 * terminal shall use. For characters in the East Asian Ambiguous (A)
7529 * class, the width choice depends purely on a preference of backward
7530 * compatibility with either historic CJK or Western practice.
7531 * Choosing single-width for these characters is easy to justify as
7532 * the appropriate long-term solution, as the CJK practice of
7533 * displaying these characters as double-width comes from historic
7534 * implementation simplicity (8-bit encoded characters were displayed
7535 * single-width and 16-bit ones double-width, even for Greek,
7536 * Cyrillic, etc.) and not any typographic considerations.
7537 *
7538 * Much less clear is the choice of width for the Not East Asian
7539 * (Neutral) class. Existing practice does not dictate a width for any
7540 * of these characters. It would nevertheless make sense
7541 * typographically to allocate two character cells to characters such
7542 * as for instance EM SPACE or VOLUME INTEGRAL, which cannot be
7543 * represented adequately with a single-width glyph. The following
7544 * routines at present merely assign a single-cell width to all
7545 * neutral characters, in the interest of simplicity. This is not
7546 * entirely satisfactory and should be reconsidered before
7547 * establishing a formal standard in this area. At the moment, the
7548 * decision which Not East Asian (Neutral) characters should be
7549 * represented by double-width glyphs cannot yet be answered by
7550 * applying a simple rule from the Unicode database content. Setting
7551 * up a proper standard for the behavior of UTF-8 character terminals
7552 * will require a careful analysis not only of each Unicode character,
7553 * but also of each presentation form, something the author of these
7554 * routines has avoided to do so far.
7555 *
7556 * http://www.unicode.org/unicode/reports/tr11/
7557 *
7558 * Markus Kuhn -- 2007-05-26 (Unicode 5.0)
7559 *
7560 * Permission to use, copy, modify, and distribute this software
7561 * for any purpose and without fee is hereby granted. The author
7562 * disclaims all warranties with regard to this software.
7563 *
7564 * Latest version: http://www.cl.cam.ac.uk/~mgk25/ucs/wcwidth.c
7565 */
7566
7567/* #include "wcwidth.h" */ /* Commented by amalgamation script */
7568
7569#ifdef FT_HAVE_WCHAR
7570
7571
7572struct interval {
7573 int32_t first;
7574 int32_t last;
7575};
7576
7577/* auxiliary function for binary search in interval table */
7578static int bisearch(int32_t ucs, const struct interval *table, int max)
7579{
7580 int min = 0;
7581
7582 if (ucs < table[0].first || ucs > table[max].last)
7583 return 0;
7584 while (max >= min) {
7585 int mid = (min + max) / 2;
7586 if (ucs > table[mid].last)
7587 min = mid + 1;
7588 else if (ucs < table[mid].first)
7589 max = mid - 1;
7590 else
7591 return 1;
7592 }
7593
7594 return 0;
7595}
7596
7597
7598/* The following two functions define the column width of an ISO 10646
7599 * character as follows:
7600 *
7601 * - The null character (U+0000) has a column width of 0.
7602 *
7603 * - Other C0/C1 control characters and DEL will lead to a return
7604 * value of -1.
7605 *
7606 * - Non-spacing and enclosing combining characters (general
7607 * category code Mn or Me in the Unicode database) have a
7608 * column width of 0.
7609 *
7610 * - SOFT HYPHEN (U+00AD) has a column width of 1.
7611 *
7612 * - Other format characters (general category code Cf in the Unicode
7613 * database) and ZERO WIDTH SPACE (U+200B) have a column width of 0.
7614 *
7615 * - Hangul Jamo medial vowels and final consonants (U+1160-U+11FF)
7616 * have a column width of 0.
7617 *
7618 * - Spacing characters in the East Asian Wide (W) or East Asian
7619 * Full-width (F) category as defined in Unicode Technical
7620 * Report #11 have a column width of 2.
7621 *
7622 * - All remaining characters (including all printable
7623 * ISO 8859-1 and WGL4 characters, Unicode control characters,
7624 * etc.) have a column width of 1.
7625 *
7626 * This implementation assumes that wchar_t characters are encoded
7627 * in ISO 10646.
7628 */
7629
7630static int mk_wcwidth(wchar_t wcs)
7631{
7632 /* sorted list of non-overlapping intervals of non-spacing characters */
7633 /* generated by "uniset +cat=Me +cat=Mn +cat=Cf -00AD +1160-11FF +200B c" */
7634 static const struct interval combining[] = {
7635 { 0x0300, 0x036F }, { 0x0483, 0x0486 }, { 0x0488, 0x0489 },
7636 { 0x0591, 0x05BD }, { 0x05BF, 0x05BF }, { 0x05C1, 0x05C2 },
7637 { 0x05C4, 0x05C5 }, { 0x05C7, 0x05C7 }, { 0x0600, 0x0603 },
7638 { 0x0610, 0x0615 }, { 0x064B, 0x065E }, { 0x0670, 0x0670 },
7639 { 0x06D6, 0x06E4 }, { 0x06E7, 0x06E8 }, { 0x06EA, 0x06ED },
7640 { 0x070F, 0x070F }, { 0x0711, 0x0711 }, { 0x0730, 0x074A },
7641 { 0x07A6, 0x07B0 }, { 0x07EB, 0x07F3 }, { 0x0901, 0x0902 },
7642 { 0x093C, 0x093C }, { 0x0941, 0x0948 }, { 0x094D, 0x094D },
7643 { 0x0951, 0x0954 }, { 0x0962, 0x0963 }, { 0x0981, 0x0981 },
7644 { 0x09BC, 0x09BC }, { 0x09C1, 0x09C4 }, { 0x09CD, 0x09CD },
7645 { 0x09E2, 0x09E3 }, { 0x0A01, 0x0A02 }, { 0x0A3C, 0x0A3C },
7646 { 0x0A41, 0x0A42 }, { 0x0A47, 0x0A48 }, { 0x0A4B, 0x0A4D },
7647 { 0x0A70, 0x0A71 }, { 0x0A81, 0x0A82 }, { 0x0ABC, 0x0ABC },
7648 { 0x0AC1, 0x0AC5 }, { 0x0AC7, 0x0AC8 }, { 0x0ACD, 0x0ACD },
7649 { 0x0AE2, 0x0AE3 }, { 0x0B01, 0x0B01 }, { 0x0B3C, 0x0B3C },
7650 { 0x0B3F, 0x0B3F }, { 0x0B41, 0x0B43 }, { 0x0B4D, 0x0B4D },
7651 { 0x0B56, 0x0B56 }, { 0x0B82, 0x0B82 }, { 0x0BC0, 0x0BC0 },
7652 { 0x0BCD, 0x0BCD }, { 0x0C3E, 0x0C40 }, { 0x0C46, 0x0C48 },
7653 { 0x0C4A, 0x0C4D }, { 0x0C55, 0x0C56 }, { 0x0CBC, 0x0CBC },
7654 { 0x0CBF, 0x0CBF }, { 0x0CC6, 0x0CC6 }, { 0x0CCC, 0x0CCD },
7655 { 0x0CE2, 0x0CE3 }, { 0x0D41, 0x0D43 }, { 0x0D4D, 0x0D4D },
7656 { 0x0DCA, 0x0DCA }, { 0x0DD2, 0x0DD4 }, { 0x0DD6, 0x0DD6 },
7657 { 0x0E31, 0x0E31 }, { 0x0E34, 0x0E3A }, { 0x0E47, 0x0E4E },
7658 { 0x0EB1, 0x0EB1 }, { 0x0EB4, 0x0EB9 }, { 0x0EBB, 0x0EBC },
7659 { 0x0EC8, 0x0ECD }, { 0x0F18, 0x0F19 }, { 0x0F35, 0x0F35 },
7660 { 0x0F37, 0x0F37 }, { 0x0F39, 0x0F39 }, { 0x0F71, 0x0F7E },
7661 { 0x0F80, 0x0F84 }, { 0x0F86, 0x0F87 }, { 0x0F90, 0x0F97 },
7662 { 0x0F99, 0x0FBC }, { 0x0FC6, 0x0FC6 }, { 0x102D, 0x1030 },
7663 { 0x1032, 0x1032 }, { 0x1036, 0x1037 }, { 0x1039, 0x1039 },
7664 { 0x1058, 0x1059 }, { 0x1160, 0x11FF }, { 0x135F, 0x135F },
7665 { 0x1712, 0x1714 }, { 0x1732, 0x1734 }, { 0x1752, 0x1753 },
7666 { 0x1772, 0x1773 }, { 0x17B4, 0x17B5 }, { 0x17B7, 0x17BD },
7667 { 0x17C6, 0x17C6 }, { 0x17C9, 0x17D3 }, { 0x17DD, 0x17DD },
7668 { 0x180B, 0x180D }, { 0x18A9, 0x18A9 }, { 0x1920, 0x1922 },
7669 { 0x1927, 0x1928 }, { 0x1932, 0x1932 }, { 0x1939, 0x193B },
7670 { 0x1A17, 0x1A18 }, { 0x1B00, 0x1B03 }, { 0x1B34, 0x1B34 },
7671 { 0x1B36, 0x1B3A }, { 0x1B3C, 0x1B3C }, { 0x1B42, 0x1B42 },
7672 { 0x1B6B, 0x1B73 }, { 0x1DC0, 0x1DCA }, { 0x1DFE, 0x1DFF },
7673 { 0x200B, 0x200F }, { 0x202A, 0x202E }, { 0x2060, 0x2063 },
7674 { 0x206A, 0x206F }, { 0x20D0, 0x20EF }, { 0x302A, 0x302F },
7675 { 0x3099, 0x309A }, { 0xA806, 0xA806 }, { 0xA80B, 0xA80B },
7676 { 0xA825, 0xA826 }, { 0xFB1E, 0xFB1E }, { 0xFE00, 0xFE0F },
7677 { 0xFE20, 0xFE23 }, { 0xFEFF, 0xFEFF }, { 0xFFF9, 0xFFFB },
7678 { 0x10A01, 0x10A03 }, { 0x10A05, 0x10A06 }, { 0x10A0C, 0x10A0F },
7679 { 0x10A38, 0x10A3A }, { 0x10A3F, 0x10A3F }, { 0x1D167, 0x1D169 },
7680 { 0x1D173, 0x1D182 }, { 0x1D185, 0x1D18B }, { 0x1D1AA, 0x1D1AD },
7681 { 0x1D242, 0x1D244 }, { 0xE0001, 0xE0001 }, { 0xE0020, 0xE007F },
7682 { 0xE0100, 0xE01EF }
7683 };
7684
7685 /* We convert wchar_t to int32_t to avoid compiler warnings
7686 * about implicit integer conversions
7687 * https://github.com/seleznevae/libfort/issues/20
7688 *
7689 * note: didn't test if we can do it
7690 */
7691 int32_t ucs = (int32_t)wcs;
7692
7693 /* test for 8-bit control characters */
7694 if (ucs == 0)
7695 return 0;
7696 if (ucs < 32 || (ucs >= 0x7f && ucs < 0xa0))
7697 return -1;
7698
7699 /* binary search in table of non-spacing characters */
7700 if (bisearch(ucs, combining,
7701 sizeof(combining) / sizeof(struct interval) - 1))
7702 return 0;
7703
7704 /* if we arrive here, ucs is not a combining or C0/C1 control character */
7705
7706 return 1 +
7707 (ucs >= 0x1100 &&
7708 (ucs <= 0x115f || /* Hangul Jamo init. consonants */
7709 ucs == 0x2329 || ucs == 0x232a ||
7710 (ucs >= 0x2e80 && ucs <= 0xa4cf &&
7711 ucs != 0x303f) || /* CJK ... Yi */
7712 (ucs >= 0xac00 && ucs <= 0xd7a3) || /* Hangul Syllables */
7713 (ucs >= 0xf900 && ucs <= 0xfaff) || /* CJK Compatibility Ideographs */
7714 (ucs >= 0xfe10 && ucs <= 0xfe19) || /* Vertical forms */
7715 (ucs >= 0xfe30 && ucs <= 0xfe6f) || /* CJK Compatibility Forms */
7716 (ucs >= 0xff00 && ucs <= 0xff60) || /* Fullwidth Forms */
7717 (ucs >= 0xffe0 && ucs <= 0xffe6) ||
7718 (ucs >= 0x20000 && ucs <= 0x2fffd) ||
7719 (ucs >= 0x30000 && ucs <= 0x3fffd)));
7720}
7721
7722
7723FT_INTERNAL
7724int mk_wcswidth(const wchar_t *pwcs, size_t n)
7725{
7726 int width = 0;
7727
7728 for (; *pwcs && n-- > 0; pwcs++) {
7729 int w;
7730 if ((w = mk_wcwidth(*pwcs)) < 0)
7731 return -1;
7732 else
7733 width += w;
7734 }
7735
7736 return width;
7737}
7738#endif /* FT_HAVE_WCHAR */
7739
7740/********************************************************
7741 End of file "wcwidth.c"
7742 ********************************************************/

utf8ndup
utf8_nonnull utf8_weak void * utf8ndup(const void *src, size_t n)

columns_number_in_fmt_u8string
static size_t columns_number_in_fmt_u8string(const void *fmt)

FT_INTERNAL void get_reset_style_tag_for_cell(const f_table_properties_t *props, size_t row, size_t col, char *style_tag, size_t sz)

FORT_BASIC_STYLE
